Go to **Google Play Console**\n2. Select your **TEFPrep Pro** app\n3. In the left sidebar, go to **\"Release\"** → **\"Setup\"** → **\"App integrity\"**\n4. Scroll down to **\"App signing\"** section\n5. You'll see two SHA certificate fingerprints:\n   - **SHA-1 certificate fingerprint**\n   - **SHA-256 certificate fingerprint**\n6. **Copy both** of these\n\n---\n\n**Step 2: Add SHA Keys to Firebase**\n\n1. Go to **Firebase Console**: https://console.firebase.google.com\n2. Select your **tefprep-pro** project\n3. Click on **Settings** (gear icon) → **Project settings**\n4. Scroll down to **\"Your apps\"** section\n5. Click on your **Android app** (com.tefprep.pro)\n6. Scroll down to **\"SHA certificate fingerprints\"**\n7. Click **\"Add fingerprint\"**\n8. Click **\"Save\"**\n\n---\n\n**Step 3: Add SHA Keys to Google Cloud Console**\n\n1. Go to **Google Cloud Console**: https://console.cloud.google.com\n2. Select your **\"TEFPrep Pro\"** project\n3. Go to **\"APIs & Services\"** → **\"Credentials\"**\n4. Find your **OAuth 2.0 Client ID** for Android (the one you created during setup)\n5. Click on it to edit\n6. Under **\"SHA-1 certificate fingerprints\"**, click **\"Add fingerprint\"**\n7. Paste the **SHA-1** from Play Console\n8. Click **\"Save\"**\n\n---\n\n**Step 4: Rebuild the App (Important!)**\n\nAfter adding the SHA keys, you need to create a new build:\n\n```bash\neas build --platform android --profile production\n```\n\nThen upload the new AAB to closed testing to replace the current one.\n\n---\n\n**Let me know once you've copied the SHA keys from Play Console, and I'll guide you through adding them to Firebase and Google Cloud!**"}],"stop_reason":null,"stop_sequence":null,"usage":{"input_tokens":5,"cache_creation_input_tokens":272,"cache_read_input_tokens":92455,"cache_creation":{"ephemeral_5m_input_tokens":272,"ephemeral_1h_input_tokens":0},"output_tokens":596,"service_tier":"standard"}},"requestId":"req_011CXEMs8HRwNkV5zFeTnM5g","type":"assistant","uuid":"92eac34b-6ad5-4a8a-9c55-8bd8daba8e21","timestamp":"2026-01-18T06:21:15.427Z"}

Please try again later.',\n    58→        [{ text: 'OK' }]\n    59→      );\n    60→    } finally {\n    61→      setLoading(false);\n    62→    }\n    63→  };\n    64→\n    65→  // Show login prompt for guests or non-authenticated users\n    66→  if (!user || guestMode) {\n    67→    return (\n    68→      <View style={styles.emptyContainer}>\n    69→        <Text style={styles.emptyIcon}>👤</Text>\n    70→        <Text style={styles.emptyTitle}>Login Required</Text>\n    71→        <Text style={styles.emptyText}>\n    72→          {guestMode\n    73→            ? // Clear any existing attempts\n    }\n  }, [user, guestMode]);\n\n  // Refresh attempts when screen comes into focus\n  useFocusEffect(\n    React.useCallback(() => {\n      // Only load attempts if user is logged in (not guest mode)\n      if (user && !guestMode) {\n        loadAttempts();\n      }\n    }, [user, guestMode])\n  );\n\n  const loadAttempts = async () => {\n    if (!user) return;\n\n    try {\n      const userAttempts = await testAttemptService.getUserAttempts(user.uid);\n      setAttempts(userAttempts);\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error('Error loading attempts:', error);\n      Alert.alert(\n        'Error',\n        'Failed to load your test history. Please try again later.',\n        [{ text: 'OK' }]\n      );\n    } finally {\n      setLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  // Show login prompt for guests or non-authenticated users\n  if (!user || guestMode) {\n    return (\n      <View style={styles.emptyContainer}>\n        <Text style={styles.emptyIcon}>👤</Text>\n        <Text style={styles.emptyTitle}>Login Required</Text>\n        <Text style={styles.emptyText}>\n          {guestMode\n            ? style={styles.loginButton}\n          onPress={() => navigation.getParent()?.navigate('Login' as never)}\n        >\n          <Text style={styles.loginButtonText}>Go to Login</Text>\n        </TouchableOpacity>\n      </View>\n    );\n  }\n\n  if (loading) {\n    return (\n      <View style={styles.loadingContainer}>\n        <ActivityIndicator size=\"large\" color={Colors.primary} />\n      </View>\n    );\n  }\n\n  const stats = testAttemptService.calculateStats(attempts);\n\n  return (\n    <ScrollView style={styles.container}>\n      <View style={styles.header}>\n        <Text style={[styles.statValue, { color: Colors.secondary }]}>\n            {stats.averageScore}%\n          </Text>\n          <Text style={styles.statLabel}>Average Score</Text>\n        </View>\n\n Colors.warning\n                        : Colors.error,\n                  },\n                ]}\n              />\n            </View>\n\n            <Text style={styles.performanceValue}>{stats.averageScore}%</Text>\n          </View>\n        </View>\n      )}\n\n      <View style={styles.recentSection}>\n        <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>Recent Tests</Text>\n\n        {attempts.length === 0 ? { TestAttempt } from '../types';\n\ntype Props = {\n  navigation: NativeStackNavigationProp<any>;\n};\n\nexport default function ProgressScreen({ navigation }: Props) {\n  const { user, guestMode } = useAuth();\n  const [attempts, setAttempts] = useState<TestAttempt[]>([]);\n  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);\n\n  useEffect(() => {\n    // Only load attempts if user is logged in (not guest mode)\n    if (user && !guestMode) {\n      loadAttempts();\n    } else {\n      setLoading(false);\n      setAttempts([]); // Clear any existing attempts\n    }\n  }, [user, guestMode]);\n\n  // Refresh attempts when screen comes into focus\n  useFocusEffect(\n    React.useCallback(() => {\n      // Only load attempts if user is logged in (not guest mode)\n      if (user && !guestMode) {\n        loadAttempts();\n      }\n    }, [user, guestMode])\n  );\n\n  const loadAttempts = async () => {\n    if (!user) return;\n\n    try {\n      const userAttempts = await testAttemptService.getUserAttempts(user.uid);\n      setAttempts(userAttempts);\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error('Error loading attempts:', error);\n      Alert.alert(\n        'Error',\n        'Failed to load your test history. Please try again later.',\n        [{ text: 'OK' }]\n      );\n    } finally {\n      setLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  // Show login prompt for guests or non-authenticated users\n  if (!user || guestMode) {\n    return (\n      <View style={styles.emptyContainer}>\n        <Text style={styles.emptyIcon}>👤</Text>\n        <Text style={styles.emptyTitle}>Login Required</Text>\n        <Text style={styles.emptyText}>\n          {guestMode\n            ? 'Create an account or login to track your progress and save your test results'\n            : 'Please login to view your progress'}\n        </Text>\n        <TouchableOpacity\n          style={styles.loginButton}\n          onPress={() => navigation.getParent()?.navigate('Login' as never)}\n        >\n          <Text style={styles.loginButtonText}>Go to Login</Text>\n        </TouchableOpacity>\n      </View>\n    );\n  }\n\n  if (loading) {\n    return (\n      <View style={styles.loadingContainer}>\n        <ActivityIndicator size=\"large\" color={Colors.primary} />\n      </View>\n    );\n  }\n\n  const stats = testAttemptService.calculateStats(attempts);\n\n  return (\n    <ScrollView style={styles.container}>\n      <View style={styles.header}>\n        <Text style={[styles.statValue, { color: Colors.secondary }]}>\n            {stats.averageScore}%\n          </Text>\n          <Text style={styles.statLabel}>Average Score</Text>\n        </View>\n\n Alert,\n} from 'react-native';\nimport { NativeStackNavigationProp } from '@react-navigation/native-stack';\nimport { useFocusEffect } from '@react-navigation/native';\nimport { Colors } from '../utils/colors';\nimport { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext';\nimport { testAttemptService } from '../services/testAttemptService';\nimport { TestAttempt } from '../types';\n\ntype Props = {\n  navigation: NativeStackNavigationProp<any>;\n};\n\nexport default function ProgressScreen({ navigation }: Props) {\n  const { user, guestMode, logout } = useAuth();\n  const [attempts, setAttempts] = useState<TestAttempt[]>([]);\n  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);\n\n  useEffect(() => {\n    // Only load attempts if user is logged in (not guest mode)\n    if (user && !guestMode) {\n      loadAttempts();\n    } else {\n      setLoading(false);\n      setAttempts([]); // Clear any existing attempts\n    }\n  }, [user, guestMode]);\n\n  // Refresh attempts when screen comes into focus\n  useFocusEffect(\n    React.useCallback(() => {\n      // Only load attempts if user is logged in (not guest mode)\n      if (user && !guestMode) {\n        loadAttempts();\n      }\n    }, [user, guestMode])\n  );\n\n  const loadAttempts = async () => {\n    if (!user) return;\n\n    try {\n      const userAttempts = await testAttemptService.getUserAttempts(user.uid);\n      setAttempts(userAttempts);\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error('Error loading attempts:', error);\n      Alert.alert(\n        'Error',\n        'Failed to load your test history. Please try again later.',\n        [{ text: 'OK' }]\n      );\n    } finally {\n      setLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  // Show login prompt for guests or non-authenticated users\n  if (!user || guestMode) {\n    return (\n      <View style={styles.emptyContainer}>\n        <Text style={styles.emptyIcon}>👤</Text>\n        <Text style={styles.emptyTitle}>Login Required</Text>\n        <Text style={styles.emptyText}>\n          {guestMode\n            ? 'Create an account or login to track your progress and save your test results'\n            : 'Please login to view your progress'}\n        </Text>\n        <TouchableOpacity\n          style={styles.loginButton}\n          onPress={() => navigation.getParent()?.navigate('Login' as never)}\n        >\n          <Text style={styles.loginButtonText}>Go to Login</Text>\n        </TouchableOpacity>\n      </View>\n    );\n  }\n\n  if (loading) {\n    return (\n      <View style={styles.loadingContainer}>\n        <ActivityIndicator size=\"large\" color={Colors.primary} />\n      </View>\n    );\n  }\n\n  const stats = testAttemptService.calculateStats(attempts);\n\n  return (\n    <ScrollView style={styles.container}>\n      <View style={styles.header}>\n        <Text style={styles.headerTitle}>Your Progress</Text>\n        <Text style={styles.headerSubtitle}>Track your learning journey</Text>\n      </View>\n\n      <View style={styles.statsGrid}>\n        <View style={[styles.statCard, { backgroundColor: Colors.primary + '20' }]}>\n          <Text style={[styles.statValue, { color: Colors.primary }]}>\n            {stats.totalTests}\n          </Text>\n          <Text style={styles.statLabel}>Tests Taken</Text>\n        </View>\n\n        <View style={[styles.statCard, { backgroundColor: Colors.secondary + '20' }]}>\n          <Text style={[styles.statValue, { color: Colors.secondary }]}>\n            {stats.averageScore}%\n          </Text>\n          <Text style={styles.statLabel}>Average Score</Text>\n        </View>\n\n </Text>\n          <Text style={styles.statLabel}>Best Score</Text>\n        </View>\n\n        <View style={[styles.statCard, { backgroundColor: Colors.warning + '20' }]}>\n          <Text </View>\n\n      {stats.totalTests > 0 && (\n        <View style={styles.performanceCard}>\n          <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>Performance Overview</Text>\n\n          <View style={styles.performanceBar}>\n            <View style={styles.performanceLabels}>\n              <Text style={styles.performanceLabel}>Excellent</Text>\n              <Text style={styles.performanceLabel}>Good</Text>\n              <Text style={styles.performanceLabel}>Needs Work</Text>\n            </View>\n\n            <View style={styles.barContainer}>\n              <View\n                style={[\n                  styles.barFill,\n                  {\n                    width: `${stats.averageScore}%`,\n                    backgroundColor:\n                      stats.averageScore >= 80\n                        ? Colors.success\n                        : stats.averageScore >= 60\n                        ? Colors.warning\n                        : Colors.error,\n                  },\n                ]}\n              />\n            </View>\n\n            <Text style={styles.performanceValue}>{stats.averageScore}%</Text>\n          </View>\n        </View>\n      )}\n\n      <View style={styles.recentSection}>\n        <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>Recent Tests</Text>\n\n        {attempts.length === 0 ? (\n          <View style={styles.noTestsCard}>\n            <Text style={styles.noTestsIcon}>📝</Text>\n            <Text style={styles.noTestsTitle}>No Tests Yet</Text>\n            <Text style={styles.noTestsText}>\n              Start practicing to see your progress here\n            </Text>\n            <TouchableOpacity\n              style={styles.browseButton}\n              onPress={() => navigation.navigate('PapersTab')}\n            >\n              <Text style={styles.browseButtonText}>Browse Papers</Text>\n            </TouchableOpacity>\n          </View>\n        ) : (\n          attempts.slice(0, 10).map((attempt, index) => {\n            const percentage = Math.round(\n              (attempt.score / attempt.totalQuestions) * 100\n            );\n            const passed = percentage >= 60;\n\n            return (\n              <View key={attempt.id} style={styles.attemptCard}>\n                <View style={styles.attemptHeader}>\n                  <View style={styles.attemptInfo}>\n                    <Text style={styles.attemptTitle}>Test #{attempts.length - index}</Text>\n                    <Text style={styles.attemptDate}>\n                      {attempt.completedAt.toLocaleDateString('en-US', {\n                        month: 'short',\n                        day: 'numeric',\n                        year: 'numeric',\n                      })}\n                    </Text>\n                  </View>\n\n                  <View\n                    style={[\n                      styles.scoreCircle,\n                      {\n                        backgroundColor: passed\n                          ? Colors.success : Colors.error,\n                      },\n                    ]}\n                  >\n                    <Text\n                      style={[\n                        styles.scoreText,\n                        { color: passed ? Colors.success : Colors.error },\n                      ]}\n                    >\n                      {percentage}%\n                    </Text>\n                  </View>\n                </View>\n\n                <View style={styles.attemptStats}>\n                  <View style={styles.attemptStat}>\n                    <Text style={styles.attemptStatLabel}>Score:</Text>\n                    <Text style={styles.attemptStatValue}>\n                      {attempt.score}/{attempt.totalQuestions}\n                    </Text>\n                  </View>\n\n                  <View style={styles.attemptStat}>\n                    <Text style={styles.attemptStatLabel}>Time:</Text>\n                    <Text style={styles.attemptStatValue}>\n                      {Math.round(attempt.timeSpent / 60)} min\n                    </Text>\n                  </View>\n\n                  <View style={styles.attemptStat}>\n                    <Text style={styles.attemptStatLabel}>Status:</Text>\n                    <Text\n                      style={[\n                        styles.attemptStatValue,\n                        { color: passed ?     1→import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';\n     2→import {\n     3→  View,\n     4→  Text,\n     5→  StyleSheet,\n     6→  TouchableOpacity,\n     7→  ScrollView,\n     8→  Alert,\n     9→  ActivityIndicator,\n    10→  Platform,\n    11→  Linking,\n    12→} from 'react-native';\n    13→import { NativeStackNavigationProp } from '@react-navigation/native-stack';\n    14→import { useFocusEffect } from '@react-navigation/native';\n    15→import { Colors } from '../utils/colors';\n    16→import { useSubscription } from '../context/SubscriptionContext';\n    17→import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext';\n    18→import { revenueCatService } from '../services/revenueCatService';\n    19→import { PurchasesPackage } from 'react-native-purchases';\n    20→\n    21→type Props = {\n    22→  navigation: NativeStackNavigationProp<any>;\n    23→};\n    24→\n    25→export default function SubscriptionScreen({ navigation }: Props) {\n    26→  const { subscription, hasActiveSubscription, refreshSubscription, offerings } = useSubscription();\n    27→  const { user } = useAuth();\n    28→  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);\n    29→  const [packages, setPackages] = useState<PurchasesPackage[]>([]);\n    30→\n    31→  // Refresh subscription data and load packages when screen comes into focus\n    32→  useFocusEffect(\n    33→    React.useCallback(() => {\n    34→      refreshSubscription();\n    35→      loadPackages();\n    36→    }, [offerings])\n    37→  );\n    38→\n    39→  const loadPackages = () => {\n    40→    if (!offerings?.current) {\n    41→      console.log('No offerings available yet');\n    42→      return;\n    43→    }\n    44→\n    45→    const availablePackages = offerings.current.availablePackages;\n    46→    setPackages(availablePackages);\n    47→    console.log('Loaded', availablePackages.length, 'packages from RevenueCat');\n    48→  };\n    49→\n    50→  const getPackageDetails = (pkg: PurchasesPackage) => {\n    51→    const isMonthly = pkg.identifier === 'monthly' || pkg.product.identifier.includes('monthly');\n    52→\n    53→    return {\n    54→      id: pkg.identifier,\n    55→      name: isMonthly ? 'Monthly Plan' : 'Yearly Plan',\n    56→      price: pkg.product.priceString,\n    57→      period: isMonthly ? '/month' : '/year',\n    58→      savings: isMonthly ? null : 'Save $20/year',\n    59→      features: isMonthly\n    60→        ? [\n    61→            'Access to all premium papers',\n    62→            'Unlimited test attempts',\n    63→            'Detailed performance analytics',\n    64→            'New content added regularly',\n    65→            'Cancel anytime',\n    66→          ]\n    67→        : [\n    68→            'Everything in Monthly Plan',\n    69→            'Best value - 2 months free',\n    70→            'Priority support',\n    71→            'Early access to new features',\n    72→            'Exclusive study materials',\n    73→          ],\n    74→      popular: !isMonthly,\n    75→      package: pkg,\n    76→    };\n    77→  };\n    78→\n    79→  const handlePurchase = async (pkg: PurchasesPackage) => {\n    80→    if (!user) {\n    81→      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please login to subscribe');\n    82→      return;\n    83→    }\n    84→\n    85→    const details = getPackageDetails(pkg);\n    86→\n    87→    Alert.alert(\n    88→      'Confirm Subscription',\n    89→      `Subscribe to ${details.name} for ${details.price}${details.period}?\\n\\n` +\n    90→        (hasActiveSubscription\n    91→          ? 'This will switch your current plan.'\n    92→          : 'You will get instant access to all premium papers.'),\n    93→      [\n    94→        { text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel' },\n    95→        {\n    96→          text: 'Subscribe',\n    97→          onPress: async () => {\n    98→            setLoading(true);\n    99→            try {\n   100→              const result = await revenueCatService.purchasePackage(pkg);\n   101→\n   102→              if (result.success) {\n   103→                await refreshSubscription();\n   104→\n   105→                Alert.alert(\n   106→                  'Welcome to Premium! 🎉',\n   107→                  `You are now subscribed to the ${details.name}.\\n\\nAll premium papers are now unlocked!`,\n   108→                  [\n   109→                    {\n   110→                      text: 'Start Learning',\n   111→                      onPress: () => {\n   112→                        if (navigation.canGoBack()) {\n   113→                          navigation.goBack();\n   114→                        }\n   115→                      },\n   116→                    },\n   117→                  ]\n   118→                );\n   119→              }\n   120→            } catch (error: any) {\n   121→              // Handle specific errors\n   122→              if (error.message === 'CANCELLED') {\n   123→                // User cancelled, do nothing\n   124→                return;\n   125→              }\n   126→\n   127→              if (error.message === 'PAYMENT_PENDING') {\n   128→                Alert.alert(\n   129→                  'Payment Pending',\n   130→                  'Your payment is being processed. You will get access once the payment is confirmed.'\n   131→                );\n   132→                return;\n   133→              }\n   134→\n   135→              // Generic error\n   136→              Alert.alert(\n   137→                'Purchase Failed',\n   138→                error.message || 'Failed to complete purchase. Please try again.'\n   139→              );\n   140→            } finally {\n   141→              setLoading(false);\n   142→            }\n   143→          },\n   144→        },\n   145→      ]\n   146→    );\n   147→  };\n   148→\n   149→  const handleManageSubscription = () => {\n   150→    if (!user) return;\n   151→\n   152→    const platformName = Platform.OS === 'ios' ? 'App Store' : 'Google Play';\n   153→\n   154→    Alert.alert(\n   155→      'Manage Subscription',\n   156→      `To manage or cancel your subscription, please visit your ${platformName} account settings.\\n\\nWould you like to open ${platformName} now?`,\n   157→      [\n   158→        { text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel' },\n   159→        {\n   160→          text: `Open ${platformName}`,\n   161→          onPress: () => {\n   162→            if (Platform.OS === 'ios') {\n   163→              Linking.openURL('https://apps.apple.com/account/subscriptions');\n   164→            } else {\n   165→              Linking.openURL('https://play.google.com/store/account/subscriptions');\n   166→            }\n   167→          },\n   168→        },\n   169→      ]\n   170→    );\n   171→  };\n   172→\n   173→  const handleRestorePurchases = async () => {\n   174→    setLoading(true);\n   175→    try {\n   176→      const customerInfo = await revenueCatService.restorePurchases();\n   177→      await refreshSubscription();\n   178→\n   179→      const hasActiveEntitlement = customerInfo.entitlements.active['premium_access'] !== undefined;\n   180→\n   181→      if (hasActiveEntitlement) {\n   182→        Alert.alert(\n   183→          'Success! 🎉',\n   184→          'Your purchases have been restored successfully!\\n\\nYou now have access to all premium content.'\n   185→        );\n   186→      } else {\n   187→        Alert.alert(\n   188→          'No Purchases Found',\n   189→          'No active subscriptions were found to restore.\\n\\nIf you believe this is an error, please contact support.'\n   190→        );\n   191→      }\n   192→    } catch (error: any) {\n   193→      Alert.alert(\n   194→        'Restore Failed',\n   195→        'Failed to restore purchases. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.'\n   196→      );\n   197→    } finally {\n   198→      setLoading(false);\n   199→    }\n   200→  };\n   201→\n   202→  return (\n   203→    <>\n   204→      <ScrollView style={styles.container}>\n   205→        <View style={styles.header}>\n   206→          <Text style={styles.title}>Choose Your Plan</Text>\n   207→          <Text style={styles.subtitle}>\n   208→            Unlock all premium papers and master your French certification\n   209→          </Text>\n   210→        </View>\n   211→\n   212→        {hasActiveSubscription && subscription && (\n   213→          <View style={styles.currentPlanCard}>\n   214→            <Text style={styles.currentPlanBadge}>✓ Active</Text>\n   215→            <Text style={styles.currentPlanTitle}>Current Plan</Text>\n   216→            <Text style={styles.currentPlanName}>\n   217→              {subscription.plan === 'monthly' ? 'Monthly' : subscription.plan === 'yearly' ? 'Yearly' : 'Premium'} Subscription\n   218→            </Text>\n   219→            {subscription.expirationDate && (\n   220→              <Text style={styles.currentPlanExpiry}>\n   221→                {subscription.willRenew ? 'Renews' : 'Expires'} on{' '}\n   222→                {new Date(subscription.expirationDate).toLocaleDateString()}\n   223→              </Text>\n   224→            )}\n   225→            <TouchableOpacity\n   226→              style={styles.manageButton}\n   227→              onPress={handleManageSubscription}\n   228→            >\n   229→              <Text style={styles.manageButtonText}>Manage Subscription</Text>\n   230→            </TouchableOpacity>\n   231→          </View>\n   232→        )}\n   233→\n   234→        <View style={styles.plansContainer}>\n   235→          {packages.length > 0 ? (\n   236→            packages.map((pkg) => {\n   237→              const plan = getPackageDetails(pkg);\n   238→              return (\n   239→                <View\n   240→ <View style={styles.popularBadge}>\n   245→                      <Text style={styles.popularBadgeText}>⭐ Most Popular</Text>\n   246→                    </View>\n   247→                  )}\n   248→\n               )}\n   261→\n   262→                  <View style={styles.featuresContainer}>\n   263→                    {plan.features.map((feature, index) => (\n   264→                      <View                    styles.subscribeButton,\n   274→                      plan.popular && styles.popularSubscribeButton,\n   275→                    ]}\n   276→                    onPress={() => handlePurchase(plan.package)}\n   277→                    disabled={loading}\n   278→                  >\n   279→                    <Text\n   280→                      style={[\n   281→                        styles.subscribeButtonText,\n   282→                        plan.popular && styles.popularSubscribeButtonText,\n   283→                      ]}\n   284→                    >\n   285→                      {hasActiveSubscription ? simulations for advanced preparation\n   318→              </Text>\n   319→            </View>\n   320→          </View>\n   321→\n   322→          <View style={styles.benefitCard}>\n   323→ useFocusEffect(\n    React.useCallback(() => {\n      refreshSubscription();\n      loadPackages();\n    }, [offerings])\n  );\n\n  const loadPackages = () => {\n    if (!offerings?.current) {\n      console.log('No offerings available yet');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const availablePackages = offerings.current.availablePackages;\n    setPackages(availablePackages);\n    console.log('Loaded', availablePackages.length, 'packages from RevenueCat');\n  };\n\n  const getPackageDetails = (pkg: PurchasesPackage) => {\n    const isMonthly = pkg.identifier === 'monthly' || pkg.product.identifier.includes('monthly');\n\n    return {\n      id: pkg.identifier,\n      name: isMonthly ? 'Monthly Plan' : 'Yearly Plan',\n      price: pkg.product.priceString,\n      period: isMonthly ? '/month' : '/year',\n      savings: isMonthly ? null : 'Save $20/year',\n      features: isMonthly\n        ? [\n            'Access to all premium papers',\n            'Unlimited test attempts',\n            'Detailed performance analytics',\n            'New content added regularly',\n            'Cancel anytime',\n          ]\n        : [\n            'Everything in Monthly Plan',\n            'Best value - 2 months free',\n            'Priority support',\n            'Early access to new features',\n            'Exclusive study materials',\n          ],\n      popular: !isMonthly,\n      package: pkg,\n    };\n  };\n\n  const handlePurchase = async (pkg: PurchasesPackage) => {\n    if (!user) {\n      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please login to subscribe');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const details = getPackageDetails(pkg);\n\n    Alert.alert(\n      'Confirm Subscription',\n      `Subscribe to ${details.name} for ${details.price}${details.period}?\\n\\n` +\n        (hasActiveSubscription\n          ? 'This will switch your current plan.'\n          : 'You will get instant access to all premium papers.'),\n      [\n        { text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel' },\n        {\n          text: 'Subscribe',\n          onPress: async () => {\n            setLoading(true);\n            try {\n              const result = await revenueCatService.purchasePackage(pkg);\n\n              if (result.success) {\n                await refreshSubscription();\n\n                Alert.alert(\n                  'Welcome to Premium! 🎉',\n                  `You are now subscribed to the ${details.name}.\\n\\nAll premium papers are now unlocked!`,\n                  [\n                    {\n                      text: 'Start Learning',\n                      onPress: () => {\n                        if (navigation.canGoBack()) {\n                          navigation.goBack();\n                        }\n                      },\n                    },\n                  ]\n                );\n              }\n            } catch (error: any) {\n              // Handle specific errors\n              if (error.message === 'CANCELLED') {\n                // User cancelled, do nothing\n                return;\n              }\n\n              if (error.message === 'PAYMENT_PENDING') {\n                Alert.alert(\n                  'Payment Pending',\n                  'Your payment is being processed. You will get access once the payment is confirmed.'\n                );\n                return;\n              }\n\n              // Generic error\n              Alert.alert(\n                'Purchase Failed',\n                error.message || 'Failed to complete purchase. Please try again.'\n              );\n            } finally {\n              setLoading(false);\n            }\n          },\n        },\n      ]\n    );\n  };\n\n  const handleManageSubscription = () => {\n    if (!user) return;\n\n    const platformName = Platform.OS === 'ios' ? 'App Store' : 'Google Play';\n\n    Alert.alert(\n      'Manage Subscription',\n      `To manage or cancel your subscription, please visit your ${platformName} account settings.\\n\\nWould you like to open ${platformName} now?`,\n      [\n        { text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel' },\n        {\n          text: `Open ${platformName}`,\n          onPress: () => {\n            if (Platform.OS === 'ios') {\n              Linking.openURL('https://apps.apple.com/account/subscriptions');\n            } else {\n              Linking.openURL('https://play.google.com/store/account/subscriptions');\n            }\n          },\n        },\n      ]\n    );\n  };\n\n  const handleRestorePurchases = async () => {\n    setLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const customerInfo = await revenueCatService.restorePurchases();\n      await refreshSubscription();\n\n      const hasActiveEntitlement = customerInfo.entitlements.active['premium_access'] !== undefined;\n\n      if (hasActiveEntitlement) {\n        Alert.alert(\n          'Success! 🎉',\n          'Your purchases have been restored successfully!\\n\\nYou now have access to all premium content.'\n        );\n      } else {\n        Alert.alert(\n          'No Purchases Found',\n          'No active subscriptions were found to restore.\\n\\nIf you believe this is an error, please contact support.'\n        );\n      }\n    } catch (error: any) {\n      Alert.alert(\n        'Restore Failed',\n        'Failed to restore purchases. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.'\n      );\n    } finally {\n      setLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  return (\n    <>\n      <ScrollView style={styles.container}>\n        <View style={styles.header}>\n          <Text style={styles.title}>Choose Your Plan</Text>\n          <Text style={styles.subtitle}>\n            Unlock all premium papers and master your French certification\n          </Text>\n        </View>\n\n        {hasActiveSubscription && subscription && (\n          <View style={styles.currentPlanCard}>\n            <Text style={styles.currentPlanBadge}>✓ Active</Text>\n            <Text style={styles.currentPlanTitle}>Current Plan</Text>\n            <Text style={styles.currentPlanName}>\n              {subscription.plan === 'monthly' ? 'Yearly' : 'Premium'} Subscription\n            </Text>\n            {subscription.expirationDate && (\n              <Text style={styles.currentPlanExpiry}>\n                {subscription.willRenew ? </View>\n\n                  {plan.savings && (\n                    <View style={styles.savingsBadge}>\n                      <Text style={styles.savingsText}>{plan.savings}</Text>\n                    </View>\n                  )}\n\n                  <View style={styles.featuresContainer}>\n                    {plan.features.map((feature, index) => (\n                      <View key={index} expirationDate: string | null;\n    12→  willRenew: boolean;\n    13→  plan: 'monthly' | 'yearly' | null;\n    14→  isTestPremium?: boolean;\n    15→}\n    16→\n    17→interface SubscriptionContextType {\n    18→  subscription: SubscriptionDetails | null;\n    19→  loading: boolean;\n    20→  hasActiveSubscription: boolean;\n    21→  canAccessPaper: (isPremium: boolean) => boolean;\n    22→  refreshSubscription: () => Promise<void>;\n    23→  offerings: PurchasesOfferings | null;\n    24→}\n    25→\n    26→const SubscriptionContext = createContext<SubscriptionContextType | undefined>(undefined);\n    27→\n    28→export const SubscriptionProvider: React.FC<{ children: ReactNode }> = ({ children }) => {\n    29→  const { user } = useAuth();\n    30→  const [subscription, setSubscription] = useState<SubscriptionDetails | null>(null);\n    31→  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);\n    32→  const [offerings, '../config/firebase';\nimport { useAuth } from './AuthContext';\nimport { revenueCatService } from '../services/revenueCatService';\nimport Purchases, { CustomerInfo, PurchasesOfferings } from 'react-native-purchases';\n\ninterface SubscriptionDetails {\n  hasActiveSubscription: boolean;\n  productIdentifier: string | null;\n  expirationDate: string | null;\n  willRenew: boolean;\n  plan: 'monthly' | 'yearly' | null;\n  isTestPremium?: boolean;\n}\n\ninterface SubscriptionContextType {\n  subscription: SubscriptionDetails | null;\n  loading: boolean;\n  hasActiveSubscription: boolean;\n  canAccessPaper: (isPremium: boolean) => boolean;\n  refreshSubscription: () => Promise<void>;\n  offerings: PurchasesOfferings | null;\n}\n\nconst SubscriptionContext = null>(null);\n\n  // Update isPremium flag in user document\n  const updateUserPremiumStatus = async (isPremium: boolean) => {\n    if (!user) return;\n\n    try {\n      const userRef = doc(db, 'users', user.uid);\n      // Use setDoc with merge instead of updateDoc to handle cases where doc doesn't exist yet\n      await setDoc(userRef, {\n        isPremium,\n        premiumUpdatedAt: Timestamp.fromDate(new Date()),\n      }, { merge: true });\n      console.log(`✅ Updated user isPremium status to: ${isPremium}`);\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.warn('⚠️ Could not update user premium status - continuing anyway:', error);\n    }\n  };\n\n  // Sync RevenueCat data to Firestore for backup and analytics\n  const syncToFirestore = async (customerInfo: CustomerInfo) => {\n    if (!user) return;\n\n    try {\n      const details = await revenueCatService.getSubscriptionDetails();\n      if (!details || !details.hasActiveSubscription) {\n        // User lost premium, update user document\n        await updateUserPremiumStatus(false);\n        return;\n      }\n\n      const now = new Date();\n      const expirationDate = details.expirationDate\n        ? new to sync to Firestore:', error);\n    }\n  };\n\n  // Fetch subscription from RevenueCat\n  const fetchSubscription = async () => {\n    if (!user) {\n      setSubscription(null);\n      setLoading(false);\n      return;\n    }\n\n    try {\n      // Admin gets automatic premium access\n      if (user.email === 'admin@tefprep.com') {\n        console.log('👑 Admin premium access granted automatically');\n        setSubscription({\n          hasActiveSubscription: true,\n          productIdentifier: 'admin_premium',\n          expirationDate: null,\n          willRenew: false,\n          plan: null,\n          isTestPremium: false,\n        });\n        setLoading(false);\n        return;\n      }\n\n      // Check for test premium flag in Firestore\n      const userDocRef = doc(db, 'users', user.uid);\n      const userDoc = await getDoc(userDocRef);\n      const isTestPremium = userDoc.exists() ? userDoc.data()?.testPremium === true : false;\n\n      if (isTestPremium) {\n        console.log('🧪 Test premium access enabled for user');\n        setSubscription({\n          hasActiveSubscription: true,\n          productIdentifier: 'test_premium',\n          expirationDate: null,\n          willRenew: false,\n          plan: null,\n          isTestPremium: true,\n        });\n        setLoading(false);\n        return;\n      }\n\n      const details = await revenueCatService.getSubscriptionDetails();\n\n      if (details) {\n        const plan = details.productIdentifier?.includes('yearly')\n          ? 'yearly'\n          : details.productIdentifier?.includes('monthly')\n            ? 'monthly'\n            : null;\n\n        setSubscription({\n          hasActiveSubscription: details.hasActiveSubscription,\n          productIdentifier: details.productIdentifier,\n          expirationDate: details.expirationDate,\n          willRenew: details.willRenew,\n          plan,\n          isTestPremium: false,\n        });\n\n        // Sync to Firestore if active\n        if (details.hasActiveSubscription) {\n          const customerInfo = await revenueCatService.getCustomerInfo();\n          if (customerInfo) {\n            await syncToFirestore(customerInfo);\n          }\n        } else {\n          // No active subscription, update user document\n          await updateUserPremiumStatus(false);\n        }\n      } else {\n        setSubscription(null);\n        await updateUserPremiumStatus(false);\n      }\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.warn('⚠️ Error fetching subscription - continuing without RevenueCat:', error);\n      // Don't block - just set no subscription\n      setSubscription(null);\n    } finally {\n      setLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  // Initialize RevenueCat and load offerings\n  useEffect(() => {\n    const initializeRevenueCat = async () => {\n      try {\n        // Initialize with user ID if available\n        await revenueCatService.initialize(user?.uid);\n\n        // Identify user if logged in\n        if (user) {\n          await revenueCatService.identifyUser(user.uid);\n        }\n\n        // Load offerings - don't block if this fails\n        const offers = await revenueCatService.getOfferings();\n        setOfferings(offers);\n      } catch (error) {\n        console.warn('⚠️ RevenueCat initialization failed - continuing without subscriptions:', error);\n        // Don't block app - just set offerings to null\n        setOfferings(null);\n      }\n    };\n\n    // Don't await - let it run in background\n    initializeRevenueCat().catch(err => {\n      console.warn('⚠️ RevenueCat setup failed - app will continue without subscriptions');\n    });\n  }, [user]);\n\n  // Listen to subscription updates\n  useEffect(() => {\n    if (!user) {\n      setSubscription(null);\n      setLoading(false);\n      return;\n    }\n\n    // Initial fetch\n    fetchSubscription();\n\n    // Set up listener for purchase updates - but don't crash if RevenueCat isn't initialized\n    try {\n      Purchases.addCustomerInfoUpdateListener((customerInfo) => {\n        console.log('📱 Customer info updated from RevenueCat');\n        fetchSubscription();\n      });\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.warn('⚠️ Could not set up RevenueCat listener - continuing without it');\n    }\n\n    // Cleanup - RevenueCat doesn't require explicit removal\n    return () => {\n      // Listener is automatically cleaned up\n    };\n  }, [user]);\n\n  const hasActiveSubscription = subscription?.hasActiveSubscription ?? false;\n\n  const canAccessPaper = (isPremium: boolean) => {\n    if (!isPremium) return true;\n    return hasActiveSubscription;\n  };\n\n  const refreshSubscription = async () => {\n    await fetchSubscription();\n  };\n\n  return (\n    <SubscriptionContext.Provider\n      value={{\n        subscription,\n        loading,\n        hasActiveSubscription,\n        canAccessPaper,\n        refreshSubscription,\n        offerings,\n      }}\n    >\n      {children}\n    </SubscriptionContext.Provider>\n  );\n};\n\nexport const useSubscription = () => {\n  const context = useContext(SubscriptionContext);\n  if (!context) {\n    throw new Error('useSubscription must be used within a SubscriptionProvider');\n  }\n  return context;\n};\n","numLines":270,"startLine":1,"totalLines":270}},"sourceToolAssistantUUID":"c4c20d34-3eef-4f60-be9f-9f9e3ec99192"}

logging in development\n    41→      if (__DEV__) {\n    42→        Purchases.setLogLevel(LOG_LEVEL.DEBUG);\n    43→      }\n    44→\n    45→      // Initialize with app user ID if available\n    46→      Purchases.configure({\n    47→        apiKey,\n    48→        appUserID: userId,\n    49→      });\n    50→\n    51→      this.isInitialized = true;\n    52→      console.log('✅ RevenueCat initialized successfully');\n    53→    } catch (error) {\n    54→      console.error('❌ Failed to initialize RevenueCat:', error);\n    55→      // Don't throw - allow app to continue without RevenueCat\n    56→      this.isInitialized = false;\n    57→    }\n    58→  }\n    59→\n    60→  /**\n    61→   * Set user ID after login\n    62→   * This links the RevenueCat customer to your Firebase user\n    63→   * @param userId Firebase user ID\n    64→   */\n    65→  async identifyUser(userId: string): Promise<void> {\n    66→    try {\n    67→      const { customerInfo } = await user:', error);\n    72→      throw error;\n    73→    }\n    74→  }\n    75→\n    76→  /**\n    77→   * Logout user from RevenueCat\n    78→   * Call this when user signs out\n    79→   */\n    80→  async logoutUser(): Promise<void> {\n    81→    try {\n    82→      await Purchases.logOut();\n    83→      console.log('✅ User logged out from RevenueCat');\n    84→    } catch (error) {\n    85→      console.error('❌ Failed to logout user:', error);\n    86→      throw error;\n    87→    }\n    88→  }\n    89→\n    90→  /**\n    91→   * Get available offerings/packages from RevenueCat\n    92→   * @returns Offerings object containing available packages\n    93→   */\n    94→  async getOfferings(): Promise<PurchasesOfferings | null> {\n    95→    if (!this.isInitialized) {\n    96→      console.warn('⚠️ RevenueCat not initialized');\n    97→      return null;\n    98→    }\n    99→\n   100→    try {\n   101→      const offerings = await Purchases.getOfferings();\n   102→      if Skipping initialization. Subscriptions will not work until you add real API keys.');\n        this.isInitialized = false;\n        return;\n      }\n\n      // Configure SDK with debug logging in development\n      if (__DEV__) {\n        Purchases.setLogLevel(LOG_LEVEL.DEBUG);\n      }\n\n      // Initialize with app user ID if available\n      Purchases.configure({\n        apiKey,\n        appUserID: userId,\n      });\n\n      this.isInitialized = true;\n      console.log('✅ RevenueCat initialized successfully');\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error('❌ Failed to initialize RevenueCat:', error);\n      // Don't throw - allow app to continue without RevenueCat\n      this.isInitialized = false;\n    }\n  }\n\n  /**\n   * Set user ID after login\n   * This links the RevenueCat customer to your Logout user from RevenueCat\n   * Call this when user signs out\n   */\n  async logoutUser(): Promise<void> {\n    try {\n      await Purchases.logOut();\n      console.log('✅ User logged out from PurchasesPackage): Promise<{\n    customerInfo: CustomerInfo;\n    success: boolean;\n  }> {\n    try {\n      const { customerInfo } = await Purchases.purchasePackage(packageToPurchase);\n      console.log('✅ Purchase successful');\n      return { customerInfo, success: true };\n    } catch (error: any) {\n      // Handle specific error codes\n      if (error.userCancelled) {\n        console.log('ℹ️ User cancelled purchase');\n        throw new Error('CANCELLED');\n      }\n\n      // Check for payment pending (common on Android)\n      if (error.code === 'PAYMENT_PENDING_ERROR') Network error during purchase');\n        throw new Error('Please check your internet connection and try again.');\n      }\n\n      // Generic error\n      console.error('❌ Purchase failed:', Please try again.');\n    }\n  }\n\n  /**\n   * Get customer info (includes entitlements and active subscriptions)\n   * @returns Customer info object\n   */\n  async getCustomerInfo(): Promise<CustomerInfo | null> {\n    if (!this.isInitialized) {\n      console.warn('⚠️ RevenueCat not initialized');\n      return null;\n    }\n\n    try {\n      const customerInfo = await Purchases.getCustomerInfo();\n      return customerInfo;\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error('❌ Failed to get customer info:', error);\n      return null;\n    }\n  }\n\n  /**\n   * Check if user has active premium subscription\n   * @returns true if user has premium entitlement\n   */\n  async hasActivePremium(): Promise<boolean> {\n    try {\n      const customerInfo = await this.getCustomerInfo();\n      if (!customerInfo) return false;\n\n      // Check if user has premium entitlement\n      const entitlement = customerInfo.entitlements.active[ENTITLEMENT_ID];\n      const hasAccess = entitlement !== undefined && entitlement !== null;\n\n      if (hasAccess) {\n        console.log('✅ User has premium access');\n      } else {\n        console.log('ℹ️ User does not have premium access');\n      }\n\n      return hasAccess;\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error('❌ Failed to check premium status:', error);\n      return false;\n    }\n  }\n\n  /**\n   * Restore purchases (required for iOS)\n   * @returns Customer info after restore\n   */\n  async restorePurchases(): Promise<CustomerInfo> {\n    try {\n      const customerInfo = await Purchases.restorePurchases();\n      console.log('✅ Purchases restored successfully');\n      return customerInfo;\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error('❌ Failed to restore purchases:', error);\n      throw new Error('Failed to restore purchases. Platform,\n  Linking,\n} from 'react-native';\nimport { NativeStackNavigationProp } from '@react-navigation/native-stack';\nimport { useFocusEffect } from '@react-navigation/native';\nimport { Colors } from '../utils/colors';\nimport { useSubscription } from '../context/SubscriptionContext';\nimport { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext';\nimport { revenueCatService } from '../services/revenueCatService';\nimport { PurchasesPackage } from 'react-native-purchases';\n\ntype Props = {\n  navigation: NativeStackNavigationProp<any>;\n};\n\nexport default function SubscriptionScreen({ navigation }: Props) {\n  const { subscription, hasActiveSubscription, refreshSubscription, offerings } = useSubscription();\n  const { user } = useAuth();\n  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);\n  const [packages, setPackages] = useState<PurchasesPackage[]>([]);\n\n  // Refresh subscription data and load packages when screen comes into focus\n  useFocusEffect(\n    React.useCallback(() => {\n      refreshSubscription();\n      loadPackages();\n    }, [offerings])\n  );\n\n  const loadPackages = () => {\n    if (!offerings?.current) {\n      console.log('No offerings available yet');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const availablePackages = offerings.current.availablePackages;\n    setPackages(availablePackages);\n    console.log('Loaded', availablePackages.length, 'packages from RevenueCat');\n  };\n\n  const getPackageDetails = (pkg: PurchasesPackage) => {\n    const isMonthly = pkg.identifier === 'monthly' || pkg.product.identifier.includes('monthly');\n\n    return {\n      id: pkg.identifier,\n      name: isMonthly ? 'Monthly Plan' : 'Yearly Plan',\n      price: pkg.product.priceString,\n      period: isMonthly ? '/month' : '/year',\n      savings: isMonthly ? null : 'Save $20/year',\n      features: isMonthly\n        ? [\n            'Access to all premium papers',\n            'Unlimited test attempts',\n            'Detailed performance analytics',\n            'New content added regularly',\n            'Cancel anytime',\n          ]\n        : [\n            'Everything in Monthly Plan',\n            'Best value - 2 months free',\n            'Priority support',\n            'Early access to new features',\n            'Exclusive study materials',\n          ],\n      popular: !isMonthly,\n      package: pkg,\n    };\n  };\n\n  const handlePurchase = async (pkg: PurchasesPackage) => {\n    if (!user) {\n      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please login to subscribe');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const details = getPackageDetails(pkg);\n\n    Alert.alert(\n      'Confirm Subscription',\n      `Subscribe to ${details.name} for ${details.price}${details.period}?\\n\\n` +\n        (hasActiveSubscription\n          ? 'This will switch your current plan.'\n          : 'You will get instant access to all premium papers.'),\n      [\n        { text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel' },\n        {\n          text: 'Subscribe',\n          onPress: async () => {\n            setLoading(true);\n            try {\n              const result = await revenueCatService.purchasePackage(pkg);\n\n              if (result.success) {\n                await refreshSubscription();\n\n                Alert.alert(\n                  'Welcome to Premium! 🎉',\n                  `You are now subscribed to the ${details.name}.\\n\\nAll premium papers are now unlocked!`,\n                  [\n                    {\n                      text: 'Start Learning',\n                      onPress: () => {\n                        if (navigation.canGoBack()) {\n                          navigation.goBack();\n                        }\n                      },\n                    },\n                  ]\n                );\n              }\n            } catch (error: any) {\n              // Handle specific errors\n              if (error.message === 'CANCELLED') {\n                // User cancelled, do nothing\n                return;\n              }\n\n              if (error.message === 'PAYMENT_PENDING') {\n                Alert.alert(\n                  'Payment Pending',\n                  'Your payment is being processed. You will get access once the payment is confirmed.'\n                );\n                return;\n              }\n\n              // Generic error\n              Alert.alert(\n                'Purchase Failed',\n                error.message || 'Failed to complete purchase. Please try again.'\n              );\n            } finally {\n              setLoading(false);\n            }\n          },\n        },\n      ]\n    );\n  };\n\n  const handleManageSubscription = () => {\n    if (!user) return;\n\n    const platformName = Platform.OS === 'ios' ? 'App Store' : 'Google Play';\n\n    Alert.alert(\n      'Manage Subscription',\n      `To manage or cancel your subscription, please visit your ${platformName} account settings.\\n\\nWould you like to open ${platformName} now?`,\n      [\n        { text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel' },\n        {\n          text: `Open ${platformName}`,\n          onPress: () => {\n            if (Platform.OS === 'ios') {\n              Linking.openURL('https://apps.apple.com/account/subscriptions');\n            } else {\n              Linking.openURL('https://play.google.com/store/account/subscriptions');\n            }\n          },\n        },\n      ]\n    );\n  };\n\n  const handleRestorePurchases = async () => {\n    setLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const customerInfo = await revenueCatService.restorePurchases();\n      await refreshSubscription();\n\n      const hasActiveEntitlement = customerInfo.entitlements.active['premium_access'] !== undefined;\n\n      if (hasActiveEntitlement) {\n        Alert.alert(\n          'Success! 🎉',\n          'Your purchases have been restored successfully!\\n\\nYou now have access to all premium content.'\n        );\n      } else {\n        Alert.alert(\n          'No Purchases Found',\n          'No active subscriptions were found to restore.\\n\\nIf you believe this is an error, please contact support.'\n        );\n      }\n    } catch (error: any) {\n      Alert.alert(\n        'Restore Failed',\n        'Failed to restore purchases. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.'\n      );\n    } finally {\n      setLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  return (\n    <>\n      <ScrollView style={styles.container}>\n        <View style={styles.header}>\n          <Text style={styles.title}>Choose Your Plan</Text>\n          <Text style={styles.subtitle}>\n            Unlock all premium papers and master your French certification\n          </Text>\n        </View>\n\n        {hasActiveSubscription && subscription && (\n          <View style={styles.currentPlanCard}>\n            <Text style={styles.currentPlanBadge}>✓ Active</Text>\n            <Text style={styles.currentPlanTitle}>Current Plan</Text>\n            <Text style={styles.currentPlanName}>\n              {subscription.plan === 'monthly' ? 'Monthly' : subscription.plan === 'yearly' ? 'Yearly' : 'Premium'} Subscription\n            </Text>\n            {subscription.expirationDate && (\n              <Text style={styles.currentPlanExpiry}>\n                {subscription.willRenew ? 'Renews' : 'Expires'} on{' '}\n                {new Date(subscription.expirationDate).toLocaleDateString()}\n              </Text>\n            )}\n            <TouchableOpacity\n              style={styles.manageButton}\n              onPress={handleManageSubscription}\n            >\n              <Text style={styles.manageButtonText}>Manage Subscription</Text>\n            </TouchableOpacity>\n          </View>\n        )}\n\n        <View style={styles.plansContainer}>\n          {packages.length > 0 ? (\n            packages.map((pkg) => {\n              const plan = getPackageDetails(pkg);\n              return (\n                <View\n                  key={plan.id}\n                  style={[styles.planCard, plan.popular && styles.popularPlan]}\n                >\n                  {plan.popular && (\n                    <View style={styles.popularBadge}>\n                      <Text style={styles.popularBadgeText}>⭐ Most Popular</Text>\n                    </View>\n                  )}\n\n                  <Text style={styles.planName}>{plan.name}</Text>\n\n                  <View style={styles.priceContainer}>\n                    <Text style={styles.price}>{plan.price}</Text>\n                    <Text style={styles.period}>{plan.period}</Text>\n                  </View>\n\n                  {plan.savings && (\n                    <View style={styles.savingsBadge}>\n                      <Text style={styles.savingsText}>{plan.savings}</Text>\n                    </View>\n                  )}\n\n                  <View style={styles.featuresContainer}>\n                    {plan.features.map((feature, index) => (\n                      <View key={index} style={styles.featureRow}>\n                        <Text style={styles.checkmark}>✓</Text>\n                        <Text style={styles.featureText}>{feature}</Text>\n                      </View>\n                    ))}\n                  </View>\n\n                  <TouchableOpacity\n                    style={[\n                      styles.subscribeButton,\n                      plan.popular && styles.popularSubscribeButton,\n                    ]}\n                    onPress={() => handlePurchase(plan.package)}\n                    disabled={loading}\n                  >\n                    <Text\n                      style={[\n                        styles.subscribeButtonText,\n                        plan.popular && styles.popularSubscribeButtonText,\n                      ]}\n                    >\n                      {hasActiveSubscription ? 'Switch Plan' : 'Subscribe Now'}\n                    </Text>\n                  </TouchableOpacity>\n                </View>\n              );\n            })\n          ) : (\n            <View View,\n  Text,\n  StyleSheet,\n  TouchableOpacity,\n  ScrollView,\n  Alert,\n  ActivityIndicator,\n  Platform,\n  Linking,\n} from 'react-native';\nimport { NativeStackNavigationProp } from 'react-native-purchases';\n\ntype Props = {\n  navigation: NativeStackNavigationProp<any>;\n};\n\nexport default function SubscriptionScreen({ navigation }: Props) {\n  const { subscription, hasActiveSubscription, refreshSubscription, offerings } = useSubscription();\n  const { user } = useAuth();\n  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);\n  const [packages, setPackages] = useState<PurchasesPackage[]>([]);\n\n  // Refresh subscription data and load packages when screen comes into focus\n  useFocusEffect(\n    React.useCallback(() => {\n      refreshSubscription();\n offerings?.current:', offerings?.current);\n\n    if (!offerings) {\n      console.log('❌ No offerings object available');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    if (!offerings?.current) {\n      console.log('❌ No current offering available');\n      console.log('🔍 All offerings:', Object.keys(offerings.all));\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const availablePackages = offerings.current.availablePackages;\n    setPackages(availablePackages);\n    console.log('✅ Loaded', availablePackages.length, 'packages from RevenueCat');\n    availablePackages.forEach((pkg, index) => {\n      console.log(`📦 Package ${index + 1}:`, pkg.identifier, pkg.product.identifier);\n    });\n  };\n\n  const getPackageDetails = (pkg: PurchasesPackage) => {\n    const isMonthly = pkg.identifier === 'monthly' || pkg.product.identifier.includes('monthly');\n\n    return {\n      id: pkg.identifier,\n      name: isMonthly ? 'Monthly Plan' : 'Yearly Plan',\n      price: pkg.product.priceString,\n      period: isMonthly ? '/month' : '/year',\n      savings: isMonthly ? null : 'Save $20/year',\n      features: isMonthly\n        ? [\n            'Access to all premium papers',\n            'Unlimited test attempts',\n            'Detailed performance analytics',\n            'New content added regularly',\n            'Cancel anytime',\n          ]\n        : [\n            'Everything in Monthly Plan',\n            'Best value - 2 months free',\n            'Priority support',\n            'Early access to new features',\n            'Exclusive study materials',\n          ],\n      popular: !isMonthly,\n      package: pkg,\n    };\n  };\n\n  const handlePurchase = async (pkg: PurchasesPackage) => {\n    if (!user) {\n      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please login to subscribe');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const details = getPackageDetails(pkg);\n\n    Alert.alert(\n      'Confirm Subscription',\n      `Subscribe to ${details.name} for ${details.price}${details.period}?\\n\\n` +\n        (hasActiveSubscription\n          ? 'This will switch your current plan.'\n          : 'You will get instant access to all premium papers.'),\n      [\n        { text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel' },\n        {\n          text: 'Subscribe',\n          onPress: async () => {\n            setLoading(true);\n            try {\n              const result = await revenueCatService.purchasePackage(pkg);\n\n              if (result.success) {\n                await refreshSubscription();\n\n                Alert.alert(\n                  'Welcome to Premium! 🎉',\n                  `You are now subscribed to the ${details.name}.\\n\\nAll premium papers are now unlocked!`,\n                  [\n                    {\n                      text: 'Start Learning',\n                      onPress: () => {\n                        if (navigation.canGoBack()) {\n                          navigation.goBack();\n                        }\n                      },\n                    },\n                  ]\n                );\n              }\n            } catch (error: any) {\n              // Handle specific errors\n              if (error.message === 'CANCELLED') {\n                // User cancelled, do nothing\n                return;\n              }\n\n              if (error.message === 'PAYMENT_PENDING') {\n                Alert.alert(\n                  'Payment Pending',\n                  'Your payment is being processed. You will get access once the payment is confirmed.'\n                );\n                return;\n              }\n\n              // Generic error\n              Alert.alert(\n                'Purchase Failed',\n                error.message || 'Failed to complete purchase. Please try again.'\n              );\n            } finally {\n              setLoading(false);\n            }\n          },\n        },\n      ]\n    );\n  };\n\n  const handleManageSubscription = () => {\n    if (!user) return;\n\n    const platformName = Platform.OS === 'ios' ? 'App Store' : 'Google Play';\n\n    Alert.alert(\n      'Manage Subscription',\n      `To manage or cancel your subscription, please visit your ${platformName} account settings.\\n\\nWould you like to open ${platformName} now?`,\n      [\n        { text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel' },\n        {\n          text: `Open ${platformName}`,\n          onPress: () => {\n            if (Platform.OS === 'ios') {\n              Linking.openURL('https://apps.apple.com/account/subscriptions');\n            } else {\n              Linking.openURL('https://play.google.com/store/account/subscriptions');\n            }\n          },\n        },\n      ]\n    );\n  };\n\n  const handleRestorePurchases = async () => {\n    setLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const customerInfo = await revenueCatService.restorePurchases();\n      await refreshSubscription();\n\n      const hasActiveEntitlement = customerInfo.entitlements.active['premium_access'] !== undefined;\n\n      if (hasActiveEntitlement) {\n        Alert.alert(\n          'Success! 🎉',\n          'Your purchases have been restored successfully!\\n\\nYou now have access to all premium content.'\n        );\n      } else {\n        Alert.alert(\n          'No Purchases Found',\n          'No active subscriptions were found to restore.\\n\\nIf you believe this is an error, please contact support.'\n        );\n      }\n    } catch (error: any) {\n      Alert.alert(\n        'Restore Failed',\n        'Failed to restore purchases. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.'\n      );\n    } finally {\n      setLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  return (\n    <>\n      <ScrollView style={styles.container}>\n        <View style={styles.header}>\n          <Text style={styles.title}>Choose Your Plan</Text>\n          <Text style={styles.subtitle}>\n            Unlock all premium papers and master your French certification\n          </Text>\n        </View>\n\n        {hasActiveSubscription && subscription && (\n          <View style={styles.currentPlanCard}>\n            <Text style={styles.currentPlanBadge}>✓ Active</Text>\n            <Text style={styles.currentPlanTitle}>Current Plan</Text>\n            <Text style={styles.currentPlanName}>\n              {subscription.plan === 'monthly' ? 'Monthly' : subscription.plan === 'yearly' ? 'Yearly' : 'Premium'} Subscription\n            </Text>\n            {subscription.expirationDate && (\n              <Text style={styles.currentPlanExpiry}>\n                {subscription.willRenew ? 'Renews' : 'Expires'} on{' '}\n                {new Date(subscription.expirationDate).toLocaleDateString()}\n              </Text>\n            )}\n            <TouchableOpacity\n              style={styles.manageButton}\n              onPress={handleManageSubscription}\n            >\n              <Text style={styles.manageButtonText}>Manage Subscription</Text>\n            </TouchableOpacity>\n          </View>\n        )}\n\n        <View style={styles.plansContainer}>\n          {packages.length > 0 ?                   ))}\n                  </View>\n\n                  <TouchableOpacity\n                    style={[\n                      styles.subscribeButton,\n                      plan.popular && styles.popularSubscribeButton,\n                    ]}\n                    onPress={() => handlePurchase(plan.package)}\n                    disabled={loading}\n                  >\n                   >\n                      {hasActiveSubscription ? 'Switch Plan' : 'Subscribe Now'}\n                    </Text>\n                  </TouchableOpacity>\n                </View>\n              );\n            })\n          ) : (\n            <View '../services/revenueCatService';\nimport { PurchasesPackage } from 'react-native-purchases';\n\ntype Props = {\n  navigation: NativeStackNavigationProp<any>;\n};\n\nexport default function SubscriptionScreen({ navigation }: Props) {\n  const { subscription, hasActiveSubscription, refreshSubscription, offerings } = useSubscription();\n  const { user } = useAuth();\n  const [loading, and load packages when screen comes into focus\n  useFocusEffect(\n    React.useCallback(() => {\n      refreshSubscription();\n      loadPackages();\n    }, [offerings])\n  );\n\n  const loadPackages = () => {\n    console.log('🔍 loadPackages called');\n    console.log('🔍 offerings:', offerings);\n    console.log('🔍 offerings?.current:', offerings?.current);\n\n    if (!offerings) {\n      console.log('❌ No offerings object available');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    if (!offerings?.current) {\n      console.log('❌ No current offering available');\n      console.log('🔍 All offerings:', Object.keys(offerings.all));\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const availablePackages = offerings.current.availablePackages;\n    setPackages(availablePackages);\n    console.log('✅ Loaded', availablePackages.length, 'packages from RevenueCat');\n    availablePackages.forEach((pkg, index) => {\n      console.log(`📦 Package ${index + 1}:`, pkg.identifier, pkg.product.identifier);\n    });\n  };\n\n  const getPackageDetails = (pkg: PurchasesPackage) => {\n    const isMonthly = pkg.identifier === 'monthly' || pkg.product.identifier.includes('monthly');\n\n    return {\n      id: pkg.identifier,\n      name: isMonthly ? 'Monthly Plan' : 'Yearly Plan',\n      price: pkg.product.priceString,\n      period: isMonthly ? '/month' : '/year',\n      savings: isMonthly ? null : 'Save $20/year',\n      features: isMonthly\n        ? 'This will switch your current plan.'\n          : 'You will get instant access to all premium papers.'),\n      [\n        { text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel' },\n        {\n          text: 'Subscribe',\n          onPress: async () => {\n            setLoading(true);\n            try {\n              const result = await revenueCatService.purchasePackage(pkg);\n\n              if (result.success) {\n                await refreshSubscription();\n\n                Alert.alert(\n                  'Welcome to Premium! 🎉',\n                  `You are now subscribed to the ${details.name}.\\n\\nAll premium papers are now unlocked!`,\n                  [\n                    {\n                      text: 'Start Learning',\n                      onPress: () => {\n                        if (navigation.canGoBack()) {\n                          navigation.goBack();\n                        }\n                      },\n                    },\n                  ]\n                );\n              }\n            } catch (error: any) {\n              // Handle specific errors\n              if (error.message === 'CANCELLED') {\n                // User cancelled, do nothing\n                return;\n              }\n\n              if (error.message === 'PAYMENT_PENDING') {\n                Alert.alert(\n                  'Payment Pending',\n                  'Your payment is being processed. You will get access once the payment is confirmed.'\n                );\n                return;\n              }\n\n              // Generic error\n              Alert.alert(\n                'Purchase Failed',\n                error.message || 'Failed to complete purchase. Please try again.'\n              );\n            } finally {\n              setLoading(false);\n            }\n          },\n        },\n      ]\n    );\n  };\n\n  const handleManageSubscription = () => {\n    if (!user) return;\n\n    const platformName = Platform.OS === 'ios' ? 'App Store' : 'Google Play';\n\n    Alert.alert(\n      'Manage Subscription',\n      `To manage or cancel your subscription, please visit your ${platformName} account settings.\\n\\nWould you like to open ${platformName} now?`,\n      [\n        { text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel' },\n        {\n          text: `Open ${platformName}`,\n          onPress: () => {\n            if (Platform.OS === 'ios') {\n              Linking.openURL('https://apps.apple.com/account/subscriptions');\n            } else {\n              Linking.openURL('https://play.google.com/store/account/subscriptions');\n            }\n          },\n        },\n      ]\n    );\n  };\n\n  const handleRestorePurchases = async () => {\n    setLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const customerInfo = await revenueCatService.restorePurchases();\n      await refreshSubscription();\n\n      const hasActiveEntitlement = customerInfo.entitlements.active['premium_access'] !== undefined;\n\n      if (hasActiveEntitlement) {\n        Alert.alert(\n          'Success! 🎉',\n          'Your purchases have been restored successfully!\\n\\nYou now have access to all premium content.'\n        );\n      } else {\n        Alert.alert(\n          'No Purchases Found',\n          'No active subscriptions were found to restore.\\n\\nIf you believe this is an error, please contact support.'\n        );\n      }\n    } catch (error: any) {\n      Alert.alert(\n        'Restore Failed',\n        'Failed to restore purchases. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.'\n      );\n    } finally {\n      setLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  return (\n    <>\n      <ScrollView style={styles.container}>\n        <View style={styles.header}>\n          <Text style={styles.title}>Choose Your Plan</Text>\n          <Text style={styles.subtitle}>\n            Unlock all premium papers and master your French certification\n          </Text>\n        </View>\n\n        {hasActiveSubscription && subscription && (\n          <View style={styles.currentPlanCard}>\n            <Text style={styles.currentPlanBadge}>✓ Active</Text>\n            <Text style={styles.currentPlanTitle}>Current Plan</Text>\n            <Text style={styles.currentPlanName}>\n              {subscription.plan === 'monthly' ? 'Yearly' : 'Premium'} Subscription\n            </Text>\n            {subscription.expirationDate && (\n              <Text style={styles.currentPlanExpiry}>\n                {subscription.willRenew ?   </View>\n                  )}\n\n                  <View style={styles.featuresContainer}>\n                    {plan.features.map((feature, index) => (\n                      <View key={index}                   ))}\n                  </View>\n\n                  <TouchableOpacity\n                    style={[\n                      styles.subscribeButton,\n                      plan.popular && styles.popularSubscribeButton,\n                    ]}\n                    onPress={() => handlePurchase(plan.package)}\n                    disabled={loading}\n                  >\n                   >\n                      {hasActiveSubscription ? 'Switch Plan' : 'Subscribe Now'}\n                    </Text>\n                  </TouchableOpacity>\n                </View>\n              );\n            })\n          ) : (\n            <View SubscriptionScreen({ navigation }: Props) {\n  const { subscription, hasActiveSubscription, refreshSubscription, offerings } = useSubscription();\n  const { user } = useAuth();\n  const [loading, loading offerings\n  useEffect(() => {\n    const timer = setTimeout(() => {\n      if (packages.length === 0) {\n        console.log('⏰ Timeout waiting for offerings');\n called');\n    console.log('🔍 offerings:', offerings);\n    console.log('🔍 offerings?.current:', offerings?.current);\n\n    if (!offerings) {\n      console.log('❌ No offerings object available');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    if (!offerings?.current) {\n      console.log('❌ No current offering available');\n      console.log('🔍 All offerings:', Object.keys(offerings.all));\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const availablePackages = offerings.current.availablePackages;\n    setPackages(availablePackages);\n    console.log('✅ Loaded', availablePackages.length, 'packages from RevenueCat');\n    availablePackages.forEach((pkg, index) => {\n      console.log(`📦 Package ${index + 1}:`, pkg.identifier, pkg.product.identifier);\n    });\n  };\n\n  const getPackageDetails = (pkg: PurchasesPackage) => {\n    const isMonthly = pkg.identifier === 'monthly' || pkg.product.identifier.includes('monthly');\n\n    return {\n      id: pkg.identifier,\n      name: isMonthly ? 'Monthly Plan' : 'Yearly Plan',\n      price: pkg.product.priceString,\n      period: isMonthly ? 'This will switch your current plan.'\n          : 'You will get instant access to all premium papers.'),\n      [\n        { text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel' },\n        {\n          text: 'Subscribe',\n          onPress: async () => {\n            setLoading(true);\n            try {\n              const result = await revenueCatService.purchasePackage(pkg);\n\n              if (result.success) {\n                await refreshSubscription();\n\n                Alert.alert(\n                  'Welcome to Premium! 🎉',\n                  `You are now subscribed to the ${details.name}.\\n\\nAll premium papers are now unlocked!`,\n                  [\n                    {\n                      text: 'Start Learning',\n                      onPress: () => {\n                        if (navigation.canGoBack()) {\n                          navigation.goBack();\n                        }\n                      },\n                    },\n                  ]\n                );\n              }\n            } catch (error: any) {\n              // Handle specific errors\n              if (error.message === 'CANCELLED') {\n                // User cancelled, do nothing\n                return;\n              }\n\n              if (error.message === 'PAYMENT_PENDING') {\n                Alert.alert(\n                  'Payment Pending',\n                  'Your payment is being processed. You will get access once the payment is confirmed.'\n                );\n                return;\n              }\n\n              // Generic error\n              Alert.alert(\n                'Purchase Failed',\n                error.message || 'Failed to complete purchase. Please try again.'\n              );\n            } finally {\n              setLoading(false);\n            }\n          },\n        },\n      ]\n    );\n  };\n\n  const handleManageSubscription = () => {\n    if (!user) return;\n\n    const platformName = Platform.OS === 'ios' ? 'Yearly' : 'Premium'} Subscription\n            </Text>\n            {subscription.expirationDate && (\n              <Text style={styles.currentPlanExpiry}>\n                {subscription.willRenew ? <Text style={styles.popularBadgeText}>⭐ Most Popular</Text>\n                    </View>\n                  )}\n\n                  <Text style={styles.planName}>{plan.name}</Text>\n\n </View>\n\n                  {plan.savings && (\n                    <View style={styles.savingsBadge}>\n                      <Text style={styles.savingsText}>{plan.savings}</Text>\n                    </View>\n                  )}\n\n                  <View style={styles.featuresContainer}>\n                    {plan.features.map((feature, index) => (\n                      <View key={index}                   ))}\n                  </View>\n\n                  <TouchableOpacity\n                    style={[\n                      styles.subscribeButton,\n                      plan.popular
