Text,\n  StyleSheet,\n  TouchableOpacity,\n  ScrollView,\n  Alert,\n  ActivityIndicator,\n  Platform,\n  Linking,\n} from 'react-native';\nimport { NativeStackNavigationProp } from '@react-navigation/native-stack';\nimport { useFocusEffect } from '@react-navigation/native';\nimport { Colors } from '../utils/colors';\nimport { useSubscription } from '../context/SubscriptionContext';\nimport { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext';\nimport { revenueCatService } from '../services/revenueCatService';\nimport { PurchasesPackage } from 'react-native-purchases';\n\ntype Props = {\n  navigation: NativeStackNavigationProp<any>;\n};\n\nexport default function SubscriptionScreen({ navigation }: Props) {\n  const { subscription, hasActiveSubscription, refreshSubscription, offerings } = useSubscription();\n  const { user } = useAuth();\n  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);\n  const [packages, setPackages] = useState<PurchasesPackage[]>([]);\n  const [loadingTimeout, setLoadingTimeout] = useState(false);\n\n  // Refresh subscription data and load packages when screen comes into focus\n  useFocusEffect(\n    React.useCallback(() => {\n      refreshSubscription();\n      loadPackages();\n    }, [offerings])\n  );\n\n  // Set timeout for loading offerings\n  useEffect(() => {\n    const timer = setTimeout(() => {\n      if (packages.length === 0) {\n        console.log('⏰ Timeout waiting for offerings');\n        setLoadingTimeout(true);\n      }\n    }, 10000); // 10 seconds\n\n    return () => clearTimeout(timer);\n  }, [packages]);\n\n  const loadPackages = () => {\n    console.log('🔍 loadPackages called');\n    console.log('🔍 offerings:', offerings);\n    console.log('🔍 offerings?.current:', offerings?.current);\n\n    if (!offerings) {\n      console.log('❌ No offerings object available');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    if (!offerings?.current) {\n      console.log('❌ No current offering available');\n      console.log('🔍 All offerings:', Object.keys(offerings.all));\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const availablePackages = offerings.current.availablePackages;\n    setPackages(availablePackages);\n    console.log('✅ Loaded', availablePackages.length, 'packages from RevenueCat');\n    availablePackages.forEach((pkg, index) => {\n      console.log(`📦 Package ${index + 1}:`, pkg.identifier, pkg.product.identifier);\n    });\n  };\n\n  const getPackageDetails = (pkg: PurchasesPackage) => {\n    const isMonthly = pkg.identifier === 'monthly' || pkg.product.identifier.includes('monthly');\n\n    return {\n      id: pkg.identifier,\n      name: isMonthly ? 'Monthly Plan' : 'Yearly Plan',\n      price: pkg.product.priceString,\n      period: isMonthly ? '/month' : '/year',\n      savings: isMonthly ? null : 'Save $20/year',\n      features: isMonthly\n        ? [\n            'Access to all premium papers',\n            'Unlimited test attempts',\n            'Detailed performance analytics',\n            'New content added regularly',\n            'Cancel anytime',\n          ]\n        : [\n            'Everything in Monthly Plan',\n            'Best value - 2 months free',\n            'Priority support',\n            'Early access to new features',\n            'Exclusive study materials',\n          ],\n      popular: !isMonthly,\n      package: pkg,\n    };\n  };\n\n  const handlePurchase = async (pkg: PurchasesPackage) => {\n    if (!user) {\n      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please login to subscribe');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const details = getPackageDetails(pkg);\n\n    Alert.alert(\n      'Confirm Subscription',\n      `Subscribe to ${details.name} for ${details.price}${details.period}?\\n\\n` +\n        (hasActiveSubscription\n          ? 'This will switch your current plan.'\n          : 'You will get instant access to all premium papers.'),\n      [\n        { text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel' },\n        {\n          text: 'Subscribe',\n          onPress: async () => {\n            setLoading(true);\n            try {\n              const result = await revenueCatService.purchasePackage(pkg);\n\n              if (result.success) {\n                await refreshSubscription();\n\n                Alert.alert(\n                  'Welcome to Premium! 🎉',\n                  `You are now subscribed to the ${details.name}.\\n\\nAll premium papers are now unlocked!`,\n                  [\n                    {\n                      text: 'Start Learning',\n                      onPress: () => {\n                        if (navigation.canGoBack()) {\n                          navigation.goBack();\n                        }\n                      },\n                    },\n                  ]\n                );\n              }\n            } catch (error: any) {\n              // Handle specific errors\n              if (error.message === 'CANCELLED') {\n                // User cancelled, do nothing\n                return;\n              }\n\n              if (error.message === 'PAYMENT_PENDING') {\n                Alert.alert(\n                  'Payment Pending',\n                  'Your payment is being processed. You will get access once the payment is confirmed.'\n                );\n                return;\n              }\n\n              // Generic error\n              Alert.alert(\n                'Purchase Failed',\n                error.message || 'Failed to complete purchase. Please try again.'\n              );\n            } finally {\n              setLoading(false);\n            }\n          },\n        },\n      ]\n    );\n  };\n\n  const handleManageSubscription = () => {\n    if (!user) return;\n\n    const platformName = Platform.OS === 'ios' ? 'App Store' : 'Google Play';\n\n    Alert.alert(\n      'Manage Subscription',\n      `To manage or cancel your subscription, please visit your ${platformName} account settings.\\n\\nWould you like to open ${platformName} now?`,\n      [\n        { text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel' },\n        {\n          text: `Open ${platformName}`,\n          onPress: () => {\n            if (Platform.OS === 'ios') {\n              Linking.openURL('https://apps.apple.com/account/subscriptions');\n            } else {\n              Linking.openURL('https://play.google.com/store/account/subscriptions');\n            }\n          },\n        },\n      ]\n    );\n  };\n\n  const handleRestorePurchases = async () => {\n    setLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const customerInfo = await revenueCatService.restorePurchases();\n      await refreshSubscription();\n\n      const hasActiveEntitlement = customerInfo.entitlements.active['premium_access'] !== undefined;\n\n      if (hasActiveEntitlement) {\n        Alert.alert(\n          'Success! 🎉',\n          'Your purchases have been restored successfully!\\n\\nYou now have access to all premium content.'\n        );\n      } else {\n        Alert.alert(\n          'No Purchases Found',\n          'No active subscriptions were found to restore.\\n\\nIf you believe this is an error, please contact support.'\n        );\n      }\n    } catch (error: any) {\n      Alert.alert(\n        'Restore Failed',\n        'Failed to restore purchases. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.'\n      );\n    } finally {\n      setLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  return (\n    <>\n      <ScrollView style={styles.container}>\n        <View style={styles.header}>\n          <Text style={styles.title}>Choose Your Plan</Text>\n          <Text style={styles.subtitle}>\n            Unlock all premium papers and master your French certification\n          </Text>\n        </View>\n\n        {hasActiveSubscription && subscription && (\n          <View style={styles.currentPlanCard}>\n            <Text style={styles.currentPlanBadge}>✓ Active</Text>\n            <Text style={styles.currentPlanTitle}>Current Plan</Text>\n            <Text style={styles.currentPlanName}>\n              {subscription.plan === 'monthly' ? 'Monthly' : subscription.plan === 'yearly' ? 'Yearly' : 'Premium'} Subscription\n            </Text>\n            {subscription.expirationDate && (\n              <Text style={styles.currentPlanExpiry}>\n                {subscription.willRenew ? 'Renews' : 'Expires'} on{' '}\n                {new Date(subscription.expirationDate).toLocaleDateString()}\n              </Text>\n            )}\n            <TouchableOpacity\n              style={styles.manageButton}\n              onPress={handleManageSubscription}\n            >\n              <Text style={styles.manageButtonText}>Manage Subscription</Text>\n            </TouchableOpacity>\n          </View>\n        )}\n\n        <View style={styles.plansContainer}>\n          {packages.length > 0 ? (\n            packages.map((pkg) => {\n              const plan = getPackageDetails(pkg);\n              return (\n                <View\n                  key={plan.id}\n                  style={[styles.planCard, plan.popular && styles.popularPlan]}\n                >\n                  {plan.popular && (\n                    <View style={styles.popularBadge}>\n                      <Text style={styles.popularBadgeText}>⭐ Most Popular</Text>\n                    </View>\n                  )}\n\n                  <Text style={styles.planName}>{plan.name}</Text>\n\n                  <View style={styles.priceContainer}>\n                    <Text style={styles.price}>{plan.price}</Text>\n                    <Text style={styles.period}>{plan.period}</Text>\n                  </View>\n\n                  {plan.savings && (\n                    <View style={styles.savingsBadge}>\n                      <Text style={styles.savingsText}>{plan.savings}</Text>\n                    </View>\n                  )}\n\n                  <View style={styles.featuresContainer}>\n                    {plan.features.map((feature, index) => (\n                      <View key={index} style={styles.featureRow}>\n                        <Text style={styles.checkmark}>✓</Text>\n                        <Text style={styles.featureText}>{feature}</Text>\n                      </View>\n                    ))}\n                  </View>\n\n                  <TouchableOpacity\n                    style={[\n                      styles.subscribeButton,\n                      plan.popular && styles.popularSubscribeButton,\n                    ]}\n                    onPress={() => handlePurchase(plan.package)}\n                    disabled={loading}\n                  >\n                    <Text\n                      style={[\n                        styles.subscribeButtonText,\n                        plan.popular && styles.popularSubscribeButtonText,\n                      ]}\n                    >\n                      {hasActiveSubscription ? 'Switch Plan' : 'Subscribe Now'}\n                    </Text>\n                  </TouchableOpacity>\n                </View>\n              );\n            })\n          ) : loadingTimeout || !offerings ? (\n            <View style={styles.loadingPackages}>\n              <Text style={styles.errorIcon}>⚠️</Text>\n              <Text style={styles.errorTitle}>Unable to Load Plans</Text>\n              <Text style={styles.errorText}>\n                {!offerings\n                  ? 'Subscription service is initializing. Please try again in a moment.'\n                  : 'We couldn\\'t load the subscription plans. Please check your internet connection and try again.'}\n              </Text>\n              <TouchableOpacity\n                style={styles.retryButton}\n                onPress={() => {\n                  setLoadingTimeout(false);\n                  refreshSubscription();\n                  loadPackages();\n                }}\n              >\n                <Text style={styles.retryButtonText}>Retry</Text>\n              </TouchableOpacity>\n            </View>\n          ) : (\n            <View style={styles.loadingPackages}>\n              <ActivityIndicator size=\"large\" color={Colors.primary} />\n              <Text style={styles.loadingPackagesText}>Loading plans...</Text>\n            </View>\n          )}\n        </View>\n\n        <View style={styles.benefitsSection}>\n          <Text style={styles.benefitsTitle}>Why Subscribe?</Text>\n\n          <View style={styles.benefitCard}>\n            <Text style={styles.benefitDescription}>\n                Access to all premium TEF practice papers covering every section\n              </Text>\n            </View>\n          </View>\n\n          <View style={styles.benefitTitle}>Unlimited Practice</Text>\n              <Text style={styles.benefitDescription}>\n                Take premium tests as many times as you want with no restrictions\n              </Text>\n            </View>\n          </View>\n        </View>\n\n        {/* Restore Purchases Button (Required for iOS) */}\n        <TouchableOpacity\n </TouchableOpacity>\n\n        <View style={styles.footer}>\n          <Text style={styles.footerText}>\n            Subscriptions will auto-renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of PurchasesOfferings,\n  PurchasesPackage,\n  CustomerInfo,\n  LOG_LEVEL,\n} from 'react-native-purchases';\nimport { Platform } from 'react-native';\nimport { REVENUECAT_API_KEY_APPLE, REVENUECAT_API_KEY_GOOGLE } from '@env';\n\n// Entitlement identifier (must match RevenueCat dashboard configuration)\nconst ENTITLEMENT_ID = 'premium_access';\n\nclass RevenueCatService {\n  private isInitialized = false;\n\n  /**\n   * Initialize RevenueCat SDK\n   * Should be called once when app starts\n   * @param userId Optional user ID to identify the user\n   */\n  async initialize(userId?: string): Promise<void> {\n    if (this.isInitialized) {\n      console.log('RevenueCat already initialized');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    try {\n      const apiKey = Platform.select({\n        ios: REVENUECAT_API_KEY_APPLE,\n        android: REVENUECAT_API_KEY_GOOGLE,\n      });\n\n      // Skip initialization if API key is not configured or is a placeholder\n      if (!apiKey || apiKey.includes('xxxx') || apiKey.length < 20) {\n        console.warn('⚠️ RevenueCat API key not configured. Skipping initialization. Subscriptions will not work until you add real API keys.');\n        this.isInitialized = false;\n        return;\n      }\n\n      // Configure SDK with debug logging in development\n      if (__DEV__) {\n        Purchases.setLogLevel(LOG_LEVEL.DEBUG);\n      }\n\n      // Initialize with app user ID if available\n      Purchases.configure({\n        apiKey,\n        appUserID: userId,\n      });\n\n      this.isInitialized = true;\n      console.log('✅ RevenueCat initialized successfully');\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error('❌ Failed to initialize RevenueCat:', error);\n      // Don't throw - allow app to continue without RevenueCat\n      this.isInitialized = false;\n    }\n  }\n\n  /**\n   * Set user ID after login\n   * This links the RevenueCat customer to your Firebase user\n   * @param userId Firebase user ID\n   */\n  async identifyUser(userId: string): Promise<void> {\n    try {\n      const { customerInfo } = await Purchases.logIn(userId);\n      console.log('✅ User identified in RevenueCat:', userId);\n      return;\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error('❌ Failed to identify user:', error);\n      throw error;\n    }\n  }\n\n  /**\n   * Logout user from RevenueCat\n   * Call this when user signs out\n   */\n  async logoutUser(): Promise<void> {\n    try {\n      await Purchases.logOut();\n      console.log('✅ User logged out from RevenueCat');\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error('❌ Failed to logout user:', error);\n      throw error;\n    }\n  }\n\n  /**\n   * Get available offerings/packages from RevenueCat\n   * @returns Offerings object containing available packages\n   */\n  async getOfferings(): Promise<PurchasesOfferings | null> {\n    if (!this.isInitialized) {\n      console.warn('⚠️ RevenueCat not initialized');\n      return null;\n    }\n\n    try {\n      const offerings = await Purchases.getOfferings();\n      if (offerings.current) {\n        console.log('✅ Loaded offerings:', offerings.current.availablePackages.length, 'packages');\n      }\n      return offerings;\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error('❌ Failed to get offerings:', error);\n      return null;\n    }\n  }\n\n  /**\n   * Purchase a package\n   * @param packageToPurchase The package to purchase\n   * @returns Purchase result with customer info\n   */\n  async purchasePackage(packageToPurchase: PurchasesPackage): Promise<{\n    customerInfo: CustomerInfo;\n    success: boolean;\n  }> {\n    try {\n      const { customerInfo } = await Purchases.purchasePackage(packageToPurchase);\n      console.log('✅ Purchase successful');\n      return { customerInfo, success: true };\n    } catch (error: any) {\n      // Handle specific error codes\n      if (error.userCancelled) {\n        console.log('ℹ️ User cancelled purchase');\n        throw new Error('CANCELLED');\n      }\n\n      // Check for payment pending (common on Android)\n      if (error.code === 'PAYMENT_PENDING_ERROR') {\n        console.log('⏳ Payment pending');\n        throw new Error('PAYMENT_PENDING');\n      }\n\n      // Network error\n      if (error.code === 'NETWORK_ERROR') {\n        console.error('🌐 Network error during purchase');\n        throw new Error('Please check your internet connection and try again.');\n      }\n\n      // Generic error\n      console.error('❌ Purchase failed:', error);\n      throw new Error(error.message || 'Purchase failed. Please try again.');\n    }\n  }\n\n  /**\n   * Get customer info (includes entitlements and active subscriptions)\n   * @returns Customer info object\n   */\n  async getCustomerInfo(): Promise<CustomerInfo | null> {\n    if (!this.isInitialized) {\n      console.warn('⚠️ RevenueCat not initialized');\n      return null;\n    }\n\n    try {\n      const customerInfo = await Purchases.getCustomerInfo();\n      return customerInfo;\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error('❌ Failed to get customer info:', error);\n      return null;\n    }\n  }\n\n  /**\n   * Check if user has active premium subscription\n   * @returns true if user has premium entitlement\n   */\n  async hasActivePremium(): Promise<boolean> {\n    try {\n      const customerInfo = await this.getCustomerInfo();\n      if (!customerInfo) return false;\n\n      // Check if user has premium entitlement\n      const entitlement = customerInfo.entitlements.active[ENTITLEMENT_ID];\n      const hasAccess = entitlement !== undefined && entitlement !== null;\n\n      if (hasAccess) {\n        console.log('✅ User has premium access');\n      } else {\n        console.log('ℹ️ User does not have premium access');\n      }\n\n      return hasAccess;\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error('❌ Failed to check premium status:', error);\n      return false;\n    }\n  }\n\n  /**\n   * Restore purchases (required for iOS)\n   * @returns Customer info after restore\n   */\n  async restorePurchases(): Promise<CustomerInfo> {\n    try {\n      const customerInfo = await Purchases.restorePurchases();\n      console.log('✅ Purchases restored successfully');\n      return customerInfo;\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error('❌ Failed to restore purchases:', error);\n      throw new Error('Failed to restore purchases. Please try again.');\n    }\n  }\n\n  /**\n   * Get detailed subscription information\n   * @returns Subscription details object\n   */\n  async getSubscriptionDetails(): Promise<{\n    hasActiveSubscription: boolean;\n    productIdentifier: string | null;\n    expirationDate: string | null;\n    willRenew: boolean;\n    isInGracePeriod: boolean;\n  } | null> {\n    if (!this.isInitialized) {\n      console.warn('⚠️ RevenueCat not initialized');\n      return null;\n    }\n\n    try {\n      const customerInfo = await this.getCustomerInfo();\n      if true,\n        productIdentifier: entitlement.productIdentifier,\n        expirationDate: entitlement.expirationDate,\n        willRenew: entitlement.willRenew,\n        isInGracePeriod: false,\n      };\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error('❌ Failed to get subscription details:', error);\n      return null;\n    }\n  }\n\n  /**\n   * Get management URL for subscription\n   * This is where users can manage their subscription in the App Store/Play Store\n   * @returns Management URL\n   */\n  async getManagementURL(): Promise<string> {\n    try {\n      const customerInfo = await this.getCustomerInfo();\n      return customerInfo?.managementURL || '';\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error('❌ Failed to get management URL:', error);\n      return '';\n    }\n  }\n}\n\n//     1→import React, { useState } from 'react';\n     2→import {\n     3→  View,\n     4→  Text,\n     5→  StyleSheet,\n     6→  TextInput,\n     7→  TouchableOpacity,\n     8→  Alert,\n     9→  KeyboardAvoidingView,\n    10→  Platform,\n    11→  ActivityIndicator,\n    12→} from 'react-native';\n    13→import { NativeStackNavigationProp } from '@react-navigation/native-stack';\n    14→import { sendPasswordResetEmail, fetchSignInMethodsForEmail } from 'firebase/auth';\n    15→import { auth } from '../config/firebase';\n    16→import { Colors } from '../utils/colors';\n    17→\n    18→type Props = {\n    19→  navigation: NativeStackNavigationProp<any>;\n    20→};\n    21→\n    22→export default function ForgotPasswordScreen({ navigation }: Props) {\n    23→  const [email, setEmail] = useState('');\n    24→  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);\n    25→  const [emailSent, setEmailSent] = useState(false);\n    26→\n    27→  const handleResetPassword = async () => {\n    28→    console.log('🔵 Password reset requested for email:', email);\n    29→\n    30→    // Validation\n    31→    if (!email) {\n    32→      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please enter your email address');\n    33→      return;\n    34→    }\n    35→\n    36→    const emailRegex = /^[^\\s@]+@[^\\s@]+\\.[^\\s@]+$/;\n    37→    if (!emailRegex.test(email)) {\n    38→      console.log('❌ Invalid email format');\n    39→      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please enter a valid email address');\n    40→      return;\n    41→    }\n    42→\n    43→    console.log('✅ Email validation passed, checking sign-in methods...');\n    44→    setLoading(true);\n    45→    try {\n    46→      // Check what sign-in methods are associated with this email\n    47→      const signInMethods = await fetchSignInMethodsForEmail(auth, email);\n    48→      console.log('Sign-in methods for', email, ':', signInMethods);\n    49→\n    50→      // If no sign-in methods found, user doesn't exist\n    51→      if (signInMethods.length === 0) {\n    52→        console.log('⚠️ No account found with this email');\n    53→        setLoading(false);\n    54→        Alert.alert(\n    55→          'Account Not Found',\n    56→          `No account exists with the email ${email}.\\n\\nPlease check the email address or sign up for a new account.`,\n    57→          [\n    58→            {\n    59→              text: 'OK',\n    60→              onPress: () => navigation.goBack(),\n    61→            },\n    62→          ]\n    63→        );\n    64→        return;\n    65→      }\n    66→\n    67→      // Check if user signed in with SSO (Google or Apple)\n    68→      const isSSOUser = signInMethods.some(method =>\n    69→        method === 'google.com' || method === 'apple.com'\n    70→      );\n React, { useState } from 'react';\nimport {\n  View,\n  Text,\n  StyleSheet,\n  TextInput,\n  TouchableOpacity,\n  Alert,\n  KeyboardAvoidingView,\n  Platform,\n  ActivityIndicator,\n} from 'react-native';\nimport { NativeStackNavigationProp } from '@react-navigation/native-stack';\nimport { sendPasswordResetEmail, fetchSignInMethodsForEmail } from 'firebase/auth';\nimport { auth } from '../config/firebase';\nimport { Colors } from '../utils/colors';\n\ntype Props = {\n  navigation: NativeStackNavigationProp<any>;\n};\n\nexport default function ForgotPasswordScreen({ navigation }: Props) {\n  const [email, setEmail] = useState('');\n  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);\n  const [emailSent, setEmailSent] = useState(false);\n\n  const handleResetPassword = async () => {\n    console.log('🔵 Password reset requested for email:', email);\n\n    // Validation\n    if (!email) {\n      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please enter your email address');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const emailRegex = /^[^\\s@]+@[^\\s@]+\\.[^\\s@]+$/;\n    if (!emailRegex.test(email)) {\n      console.log('❌ Invalid email format');\n      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please enter a valid email address');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    console.log('✅ Email validation passed, checking sign-in methods...');\n    setLoading(true);\n    try {\n      // Check what sign-in methods are associated with this email\n      const signInMethods = await fetchSignInMethodsForEmail(auth, email);\n      console.log('Sign-in methods for', email, ':', signInMethods);\n\n      // If no sign-in methods found, user doesn't exist\n      if (signInMethods.length === 0) {\n        console.log('⚠️ No account found with this email');\n        setLoading(false);\n        Alert.alert(\n          'Account Not Found',\n          `No account exists with the email ${email}.\\n\\nPlease check the email address or sign up for a new account.`,\n          [\n            {\n              text: 'OK',\n              onPress: () => navigation.goBack(),\n            },\n          ]\n        );\n        return;\n      }\n\n      // Check if user signed in with SSO (Google or Apple)\n      const isSSOUser = signInMethods.some(method =>\n        method === 'google.com' || method === 'apple.com'\n      );\n\n      if (isSSOUser) {\n        console.log('⚠️ User signed in with SSO, cannot reset password');\n        const ssoProvider = signInMethods.includes('google.com') ? 'Google' : 'Apple';\n        setLoading(false);\n        Alert.alert(\n          'SSO Account',\n          `This account uses ${ssoProvider} Sign-In. Your password is managed by ${ssoProvider}.\\n\\nTo reset your password, please visit your ${ssoProvider} account settings.`,\n          [\n            {\n              text: 'OK',\n              onPress: () => navigation.goBack(),\n            },\n          ]\n        );\n        return;\n      }\n\n      // User has email/password auth, send reset email\n      await sendPasswordResetEmail(auth, email);\n      console.log('✅ Password reset email sent successfully to:', email);\n      setEmailSent(true);\n      Alert.alert(\n        'Email Sent',\n        `A password reset link has been sent to ${email}.\\n\\nPlease check your inbox (and spam/junk folder) and click the link within 1 hour.\\n\\nNote: Each link can only be used once. If you request a new link, old links will expire.`,\n        [\n          {\n            text: 'OK',\n            onPress: () => navigation.goBack(),\n          },\n        ]\n      );\n    } catch (error: any) {\n      console.error('❌ Password reset error:', error);\n      console.error('Error code:', error.code);\n      console.error('Error message:', error.message);\n\n      if (error.code === 'auth/user-not-found') {\n        Alert.alert('Error', 'No account found with this email address');\n      } else if (error.code === 'auth/invalid-email') {\n        Alert.alert('Error', 'Invalid email address');\n      } else if (error.code === 'auth/too-many-requests') {\n        Alert.alert('Error', 'Too many requests. Please try again later.');\n      } else {\n        Alert.alert('Error', `Failed to send reset email: ${error.message}`);\n      }\n    } finally {\n      setLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  return (\n    <KeyboardAvoidingView\n      behavior={Platform.OS === 'ios' ? 'padding' : 'height'}\n      style={styles.container}\n    >\n      <View style={styles.content}>\n        <Text style={styles.title}>Forgot Password?</Text>\n        <Text style={styles.subtitle}>\n          No worries! Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.\n        </Text>\n\n        {!emailSent ? (\n          <View style={styles.form}>\n            <Text style={styles.label}>Email Address</Text>\n            <TextInput\n              style={styles.input}\n              placeholder=\"Enter your email\"\n              value={email}\n              onChangeText={setEmail}\n              keyboardType=\"email-address\"\n              autoCapitalize=\"none\"\n              autoCorrect={false}\n              placeholderTextColor={Colors.textSecondary}\n              editable={!loading}\n            />\n\n            <TouchableOpacity\n              style={[styles.button, loading && styles.buttonDisabled]}\n              onPress={handleResetPassword}\n              disabled={loading}\n            >\n              {loading ? (\n                <ActivityIndicator color={Colors.textInverse} />\n              ) : (\n                <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Send Reset Link</Text>\n              )}\n            </TouchableOpacity>\n\n            <TouchableOpacity\n              style={styles.cancelButton}\n              onPress={() => navigation.goBack()}\n              disabled={loading}\n            >\n              <Text style={styles.cancelButtonText}>Back to Login</Text>\n            </TouchableOpacity>\n          </View>\n        ) : (\n          <View style={styles.successContainer}>\n            <Text style={styles.successIcon}>✉️</Text>\n            <Text style={styles.successTitle}>Check Your Email</Text>\n            <Text style={styles.successText}>\n              We've sent a password reset link to {email}\n            </Text>\n            <TouchableOpacity\n              style={styles.button}\n              onPress={() => navigation.goBack()}\n            >\n              <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Back to Login</Text>\n            </TouchableOpacity>\n          </View>\n        )}\n      </View>\n    </KeyboardAvoidingView>\n  );\n}\n\nconst styles = {\n  View,\n  Text,\n  StyleSheet,\n  TextInput,\n  TouchableOpacity,\n  Alert,\n  KeyboardAvoidingView,\n  Platform,\n  ActivityIndicator,\n} from 'react-native';\nimport { NativeStackNavigationProp } from '@react-navigation/native-stack';\nimport { sendPasswordResetEmail, fetchSignInMethodsForEmail } from 'firebase/auth';\nimport { auth } from '../config/firebase';\nimport { Colors } from '../utils/colors';\n\ntype Props = {\n  navigation: NativeStackNavigationProp<any>;\n};\n\nexport default function ForgotPasswordScreen({ navigation }: Props) {\n  const [email, setEmail] = useState('');\n  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);\n  const [emailSent, setEmailSent] = useState(false);\n\n  const handleResetPassword = async () => {\n    console.log('🔵 Password reset requested for email:', email);\n\n    // Validation\n    if (!email) {\n      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please enter your email address');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const emailRegex = /^[^\\s@]+@[^\\s@]+\\.[^\\s@]+$/;\n    if (!emailRegex.test(email)) {\n      console.log('❌ Invalid email format');\n      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please enter a valid email address');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    console.log('✅ Email validation passed, checking sign-in methods...');\n    setLoading(true);\n    try {\n      // Check what sign-in methods are associated with this email\n      const signInMethods = await fetchSignInMethodsForEmail(auth, email);\n      console.log('Sign-in methods for', email, ':', signInMethods);\n\n      // If no sign-in methods found, user doesn't exist\n      if (signInMethods.length === 0) {\n        console.log('⚠️ No account found with this email');\n        setLoading(false);\n        Alert.alert(\n          'Account Not Found',\n          `No account exists with the email ${email}.\\n\\nPlease check the email address or sign up for a new account.`,\n          [\n            {\n              text: 'OK',\n              onPress: () => navigation.goBack(),\n            },\n          ]\n        );\n        return;\n      }\n\n      // Check if user signed in with SSO (Google or Apple)\n      const isSSOUser = signInMethods.some(method =>\n        method === 'google.com' || method === 'apple.com'\n      );\n\n      if (isSSOUser) {\n        console.log('⚠️ User signed in with SSO, cannot reset password');\n        const ssoProvider = signInMethods.includes('google.com') ? 'Google' : 'Apple';\n        setLoading(false);\n        Alert.alert(\n          'SSO Account',\n          `This account uses ${ssoProvider} Sign-In. Your password is managed by ${ssoProvider}.\\n\\nTo reset your password, please visit your ${ssoProvider} account settings.`,\n          [\n            {\n              text: 'OK',\n              onPress: () => navigation.goBack(),\n            },\n          ]\n        );\n        return;\n      }\n\n      // User has email/password auth, send reset email\n      await sendPasswordResetEmail(auth, email);\n      console.log('✅ Password reset email sent successfully to:', email);\n      setEmailSent(true);\n      Alert.alert(\n        'Email Sent',\n        `A password reset link has been sent to ${email}.\\n\\nPlease check your inbox (and spam/junk folder) and click the link within 1 hour.\\n\\nNote: Each link can only be used once. If you request a new link, old links will expire.`,\n        [\n          {\n            text: 'OK',\n            onPress: () => navigation.goBack(),\n          },\n        ]\n      );\n    } catch (error: any) {\n      console.error('❌ Password reset error:', error);\n      console.error('Error code:', error.code);\n      console.error('Error message:', error.message);\n\n      if (error.code === 'auth/user-not-found') {\n        Alert.alert('Error', 'No account found with this email address');\n      } else if (error.code === 'auth/invalid-email') {\n        Alert.alert('Error', 'Invalid email address');\n      } else if (error.code === 'auth/too-many-requests') {\n        Alert.alert('Error', 'Too many requests. Please try again later.');\n      } else {\n        Alert.alert('Error', `Failed to send reset email: ${error.message}`);\n      }\n    } finally {\n      setLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  return (\n    <KeyboardAvoidingView\n      behavior={Platform.OS === 'ios' ? 'padding' : 'height'}\n      style={styles.container}\n    >\n      <View style={styles.content}>\n        <Text style={styles.title}>Forgot Password?</Text>\n        <Text style={styles.subtitle}>\n          No worries! Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.\n        </Text>\n\n        {!emailSent ? (\n          <View style={styles.form}>\n            <Text style={styles.label}>Email Address</Text>\n            <TextInput\n              style={styles.input}\n              placeholder=\"Enter your email\"\n              value={email}\n              onChangeText={setEmail}\n              keyboardType=\"email-address\"\n              autoCapitalize=\"none\"\n              autoCorrect={false}\n              placeholderTextColor={Colors.textSecondary}\n              editable={!loading}\n            />\n\n            <TouchableOpacity\n              style={[styles.button, loading && styles.buttonDisabled]}\n              onPress={handleResetPassword}\n              disabled={loading}\n            >\n              {loading ? (\n                <ActivityIndicator color={Colors.textInverse} />\n              ) : (\n                <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Send Reset Link</Text>\n              )}\n StyleSheet,\n  TextInput,\n  TouchableOpacity,\n  Alert,\n  KeyboardAvoidingView,\n  Platform,\n  ActivityIndicator,\n} from 'react-native';\nimport { NativeStackNavigationProp } from '@react-navigation/native-stack';\nimport { sendPasswordResetEmail, fetchSignInMethodsForEmail } from 'firebase/auth';\nimport { auth } from '../config/firebase';\nimport { Colors } from '../utils/colors';\n\ntype Props = {\n  navigation: NativeStackNavigationProp<any>;\n};\n\nexport default function ForgotPasswordScreen({ navigation }: Props) {\n  const [email, setEmail] = useState('');\n  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);\n  const [emailSent, setEmailSent] = useState(false);\n\n  const handleResetPassword = async () => {\n    console.log('🔵 Password reset requested for email:', email);\n\n    // Validation\n    if (!email) {\n      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please enter your email address');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const emailRegex = /^[^\\s@]+@[^\\s@]+\\.[^\\s@]+$/;\n    if (!emailRegex.test(email)) {\n      console.log('❌ Invalid email format');\n      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please enter a valid email address');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    console.log('✅ Email validation passed, sending reset email...');\n    setLoading(true);\n    try {\n      // Try to send password reset email directly\n      // Firebase will handle the error if user doesn't exist or uses SSO\n      await sendPasswordResetEmail(auth, email);\n      console.log('✅ Password reset email sent successfully to:', email);\n      setEmailSent(true);\n      Alert.alert(\n        'Email Sent',\n        `A password reset link has been sent to ${email}.\\n\\nPlease check your inbox (and spam/junk folder) and click the link within 1 hour.\\n\\nNote: Each link can only be used once. If you request a new link, old links will expire.`,\n        [\n          {\n            text: 'OK',\n            onPress: () => navigation.goBack(),\n          },\n        ]\n      );\n    } catch (error: any) {\n      console.error('❌ Password reset error:', error);\n      console.error('Error code:', error.code);\n      console.error('Error message:', error.message);\n\n      if (error.code === 'auth/user-not-found') {\n        Alert.alert('Error', 'No account found with this email address');\n      } else if (error.code === 'auth/invalid-email') {\n        Alert.alert('Error', 'Invalid email address');\n      } else if (error.code === 'auth/too-many-requests') {\n        Alert.alert('Error', 'Too many requests. 'padding' : 'height'}\n      style={styles.container}\n    >\n      <View style={styles.content}>\n        <Text style={styles.title}>Forgot Password?</Text>\n        <Text style={styles.subtitle}>\n          No worries! Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.\n        </Text>\n\n        {!emailSent ? (\n          <View style={styles.form}>\n            <Text style={styles.label}>Email Address</Text>\n            <TextInput\n              style={styles.input}\n              placeholder=\"Enter your email\"\n              value={email}\n              onChangeText={setEmail}\n              keyboardType=\"email-address\"\n              autoCapitalize=\"none\"\n              autoCorrect={false}\n              placeholderTextColor={Colors.textSecondary}\n              editable={!loading}\n            />\n\n            <TouchableOpacity\n              style={[styles.button, loading && styles.buttonDisabled]}\n              onPress={handleResetPassword}\n              disabled={loading}\n            >\n              {loading ?           <Text style={styles.cancelButtonText}>Back to Login</Text>\n            </TouchableOpacity>\n          </View>\n        ) : (\n          <View style={styles.successContainer}>\n style={styles.buttonText}>Back to Login</Text>\n            </TouchableOpacity>\n          </View>\n        )}\n      </View>\n    </KeyboardAvoidingView>\n  );\n}\n\nconst styles = TouchableOpacity,\n  Alert,\n  KeyboardAvoidingView,\n  Platform,\n  ActivityIndicator,\n} from 'react-native';\nimport { NativeStackNavigationProp } from '@react-navigation/native-stack';\nimport { sendPasswordResetEmail, fetchSignInMethodsForEmail } from 'firebase/auth';\nimport { auth } from '../config/firebase';\nimport { Colors } from '../utils/colors';\n\ntype Props = {\n  navigation: NativeStackNavigationProp<any>;\n};\n\nexport default function ForgotPasswordScreen({ navigation }: Props) {\n  const [email, setEmail] = useState('');\n  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);\n  const [emailSent, setEmailSent] = useState(false);\n\n  const handleResetPassword = async () => {\n    console.log('🔵 Password reset requested for email:', email);\n\n    // Validation\n    if (!email) {\n      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please enter your email address');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const emailRegex = /^[^\\s@]+@[^\\s@]+\\.[^\\s@]+$/;\n    if (!emailRegex.test(email)) {\n      console.log('❌ Invalid email format');\n      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please enter a valid email address');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    console.log('✅ Email validation passed, sending reset email...');\n    setLoading(true);\n    try {\n      // Try to send password reset email directly\n      // Firebase will handle the error if user doesn't exist or uses SSO\n      await sendPasswordResetEmail(auth, email);\n      console.log('✅ Password reset email sent successfully to:', email);\n      setEmailSent(true);\n      Alert.alert(\n        'Email Sent',\n        `A password reset link has been sent to ${email}.\\n\\nPlease check your inbox (and spam/junk folder) and click the link within 1 hour.\\n\\nNote: Each link can only be used once. If you request a new link, old links will expire.`,\n        [\n          {\n            text: 'OK',\n            onPress: () => navigation.goBack(),\n          },\n        ]\n      );\n    } catch (error: any) {\n      console.error('❌ Password reset error:', error);\n      console.error('Error code:', error.code);\n      console.error('Error message:', error.message);\n\n      // For security reasons, Firebase may not reveal if email exists\n      // We show a generic message for most errors\n      if (error.code === 'auth/invalid-email') {\n        Alert.alert('Error', 'Invalid email address format');\n      } else if (error.code === 'auth/too-many-requests') {\n        Alert.alert('Error', 'Too many requests. Please try again in a few minutes.');\n      } else if (error.code === 'auth/user-not-found') {\n        // Show generic message for security\n        Alert.alert(\n          'Check Your Email',\n          'If an account exists with this email, you will receive a password reset link.\\n\\nPlease check your inbox and spam folder.',\n          [{ text: 'OK', onPress: () => navigation.goBack() }]\n        );\n      } else {\n        // Generic error - still show success message for security\n        Alert.alert(\n          'Check Your Email',\n          'If an account exists with this email, you will receive a password reset link.\\n\\nPlease check your inbox and spam folder.\\n\\nNote: If you signed up with Google or Apple, please use that method to sign in.',\n          [{ text: 'OK', onPress: () => navigation.goBack() }]\n        );\n      }\n    } finally {\n      setLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  return (\n    <KeyboardAvoidingView\n      behavior={Platform.OS === 'ios' ? 'padding' : 'height'}\n      style={styles.container}\n    >\n      <View style={styles.content}>\n        <Text style={styles.title}>Forgot Password?</Text>\n        <Text style={styles.subtitle}>\n          No worries! Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.\n        </Text>\n\n        {!emailSent ? (\n          <View style={styles.form}>\n            <Text style={styles.label}>Email Address</Text>\n            <TextInput\n              style={styles.input}\n              placeholder=\"Enter your email\"\n              value={email}\n              onChangeText={setEmail}\n              keyboardType=\"email-address\"\n              autoCapitalize=\"none\"\n              autoCorrect={false}\n              placeholderTextColor={Colors.textSecondary}\n              editable={!loading}\n            />\n\n            <TouchableOpacity\n              style={[styles.button, loading && styles.buttonDisabled]}\n              onPress={handleResetPassword}\n              disabled={loading}\n            >\n              {loading ? (\n                <ActivityIndicator color={Colors.textInverse} />\n              ) : (\n                <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Send Reset Link</Text>\n              )}\n            </TouchableOpacity>\n\n            <TouchableOpacity\n              style={styles.cancelButton}\n              onPress={() => navigation.goBack()}\n              disabled={loading}\n            >\n              <Text style={styles.cancelButtonText}>Back to Login</Text>\n            </TouchableOpacity>\n          </View>\n        ) : (\n          <View style={styles.successContainer}>\n            <Text style={styles.successIcon}>✉️</Text>\n            <Text style={styles.successTitle}>Check Your Email</Text>\n            <Text style={styles.successText}>\n              We've sent a password reset link to {email}\n            </Text>\n            <TouchableOpacity\n              style={styles.button}\n              onPress={() => navigation.goBack()}\n            >\n              <Text backgroundColor: Colors.surface,\n    borderWidth: 1,\n    borderColor: Colors.border,\n    borderRadius: 12,\n    padding: 16,\n    fontSize: 16,\n    marginBottom: 20,\n    color: Please try again in a few minutes.');\n      } else if (error.code === 'auth/user-not-found') {\n        Alert.alert(\n          'Account Not Found',\n          'No account exists with this email.\\n\\nPlease check the email address or sign up for a new account.',\n          [{ text: 'OK' }]\n        );\n      } else {\n        Alert.alert('Error', 'Failed to send reset email. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.');\n      }","originalFile":"import React, { useState } from 'react';\nimport {\n  View,\n  Text,\n  StyleSheet,\n  TextInput,\n  TouchableOpacity,\n  Alert,\n  KeyboardAvoidingView,\n  Platform,\n  ActivityIndicator,\n} from 'react-native';\nimport { NativeStackNavigationProp } from '@react-navigation/native-stack';\nimport { sendPasswordResetEmail, fetchSignInMethodsForEmail } from 'firebase/auth';\nimport { auth } from '../config/firebase';\nimport { Colors } from '../utils/colors';\n\ntype Props = {\n  navigation: NativeStackNavigationProp<any>;\n};\n\nexport default function ForgotPasswordScreen({ navigation }: Props) {\n  const [email, setEmail] = useState('');\n  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);\n  const [emailSent, setEmailSent] = useState(false);\n\n  const handleResetPassword = async () => {\n    console.log('🔵 Password reset requested for email:', email);\n\n    // Validation\n    if (!email) {\n      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please enter your email address');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const emailRegex = /^[^\\s@]+@[^\\s@]+\\.[^\\s@]+$/;\n    if (!emailRegex.test(email)) {\n      console.log('❌ Invalid email format');\n      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please enter a valid email address');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    console.log('✅ Email validation passed, checking sign-in methods...');\n    setLoading(true);\n    try {\n      // Check what sign-in methods are associated with this email\n      const signInMethods = await fetchSignInMethodsForEmail(auth, email);\n      console.log('Sign-in methods for', email, ':', signInMethods);\n\n      // Check if user signed in with SSO (Google or Apple)\n      const isSSOUser = signInMethods.some(method =>\n        method === 'google.com' || method === 'apple.com'\n      );\n\n      if (isSSOUser) {\n        console.log('⚠️ User signed in with SSO, cannot reset password');\n        const ssoProvider = signInMethods.includes('google.com') ? 'Google' : 'Apple';\n        setLoading(false);\n        Alert.alert(\n          'SSO Account',\n          `This account uses ${ssoProvider} Sign-In. Your password is managed by ${ssoProvider}.\\n\\nPlease use \"${ssoProvider} Sign-In\" to login instead of resetting your password.`,\n          [\n            {\n              text: 'OK',\n              onPress: () => navigation.goBack(),\n            },\n          ]\n        );\n        return;\n      }\n\n      // If fetchSignInMethodsForEmail returns empty, it might be a Firebase API limitation\n      // Try to send the reset email anyway - Firebase will handle if user doesn't exist\n      if (signInMethods.length === 0) {\n        console.log('⚠️ fetchSignInMethodsForEmail returned empty - trying to send reset email anyway');\n      }\n\n      // Send password reset email\n      await sendPasswordResetEmail(auth, email);\n      console.log('✅ Password reset email sent successfully to:', email);\n      setEmailSent(true);\n      Alert.alert(\n        'Email Sent',\n        `A password reset link has been sent to ${email}.\\n\\nPlease check your inbox (and spam/junk folder) and click the link within 1 hour.\\n\\nNote: Each link can only be used once. If you request a new link, old links will expire.`,\n        [\n          {\n            text: 'OK',\n            onPress: () => navigation.goBack(),\n          },\n        ]\n      );\n    } catch (error: any) {\n      console.error('❌ Password reset error:', error);\n      console.error('Error code:', error.code);\n      console.error('Error message:', error.message);\n\n      if (error.code === 'auth/invalid-email') {\n        Alert.alert('Error', 'Invalid email address format');\n      } else if (error.code === 'auth/too-many-requests') {\n        Alert.alert('Error', 'Too many requests. Please try again in a few minutes.');\n      } else if (error.code === 'auth/user-not-found') {\n        Alert.alert(\n          'Account Not Found',\n          'No account exists with this email.\\n\\nPlease check the email address or sign up for a new account.',\n          [{ text: 'OK' }]\n        );\n      } else {\n        Alert.alert('Error', `Failed to send reset email: ${error.message}`);\n      }\n    } finally {\n      setLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  return (\n    <KeyboardAvoidingView\n      behavior={Platform.OS === 'ios' ? 'padding' : 'height'}\n      style={styles.container}\n    >\n      <View style={styles.content}>\n        <Text style={styles.title}>Forgot Password?</Text>\n        <Text style={styles.subtitle}>\n          No worries! Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.\n        </Text>\n\n        {!emailSent ? (\n          <View style={styles.form}>\n            <Text style={styles.label}>Email Address</Text>\n            <TextInput\n              style={styles.input}\n              placeholder=\"Enter your email\"\n              value={email}\n              onChangeText={setEmail}\n              keyboardType=\"email-address\"\n              autoCapitalize=\"none\"\n              autoCorrect={false}\n              placeholderTextColor={Colors.textSecondary}\n              editable={!loading}\n            />\n\n            <TouchableOpacity\n              style={[styles.button, loading && styles.buttonDisabled]}\n              onPress={handleResetPassword}\n              disabled={loading}\n            >\n              {loading ? (\n                <ActivityIndicator color={Colors.textInverse} />\n              ) : (\n                <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Send Reset Link</Text>\n              )}\n            </TouchableOpacity>\n\n            <TouchableOpacity\n              style={styles.cancelButton}\n              onPress={() => navigation.goBack()}\n              disabled={loading}\n            >\n              <Text style={styles.cancelButtonText}>Back to Login</Text>\n            </TouchableOpacity>\n          </View>\n        ) : (\n          <View style={styles.successContainer}>\n View,\n  Text,\n  StyleSheet,\n  TextInput,\n  TouchableOpacity,\n  Alert,\n  KeyboardAvoidingView,\n  Platform,\n} from 'react-native';\nimport { NativeStackNavigationProp } from '@react-navigation/native-stack';\nimport { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext';\nimport { Colors } from '../utils/colors';\n\ntype Props = {\n  navigation: NativeStackNavigationProp<any>;\n};\n\nexport default function LoginScreen({ navigation }: Props) {\n  const { signIn, signUp, signInWithGoogle, signInWithApple, continueAsGuest, user } = useAuth();\n  const [email, setEmail] = useState('');\n  const [password, setPassword] = useState('');\n  const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState('');\n  const [lastName, setLastName] = useState('');\n  const [isLogin, setIsLogin] = useState(true);\n  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);\n  const [ssoLoading, setSsoLoading] = useState(false);\n  const [authSuccess, setAuthSuccess] = useState(false);\n\n  // Reset auth success flag when component unmounts\n  React.useEffect(() => {\n    return () => {\n      setAuthSuccess(false);\n      setSsoLoading(false);\n      setLoading(false);\n    };\n  }, []);\n\n  const handleSubmit = async () => {\n    console.log('🔵 Login button clicked!');\n\n    if (!email || !password) {\n      console.log('❌ Validation failed: empty fields');\n      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please fill in all fields');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    // Additional validation for sign up\n    if (!isLogin && (!firstName.trim() || !lastName.trim())) {\n      console.log('❌ Validation failed: missing name');\n      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please enter your first and last name');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    // Email validation\n    const emailRegex = /^[^\\s@]+@[^\\s@]+\\.[^\\s@]+$/;\n    if (!emailRegex.test(email)) {\n      console.log('❌ Validation failed: invalid email');\n      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please enter a valid email address');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    // Password validation\n    if (password.length < 6) {\n      console.log('❌ Validation failed: password too short');\n      Alert.alert('Error', 'Password must be at least 6 characters long');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    console.log(`✅ Validation passed, attempting ${isLogin ? 'login' : 'signup'}...`);\n    setLoading(true);\n    try {\n      if (isLogin) {\n        console.log('📧 Signing in with email:', email);\n        await signIn(email, password);\n        console.log('✅ Sign in successful!');\n        setAuthSuccess(true);\n      } else {\n        console.log('📧 Signing up with email:', email);\n        await signUp(email, password, firstName.trim(), lastName.trim());\n        console.log('✅ Sign up successful!');\n        setAuthSuccess(true);\n        Alert.alert('Success', 'Account created successfully!');\n      }\n      // Keep loading state briefly, then navigation will happen automatically\n      setTimeout(() => {\n        setLoading(false);\n      }, 500);\n    } catch (error: any) {\n      console.error('❌ Authentication error:', error);\n      Alert.alert('Error', error.message || 'Authentication failed');\n      setLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleGuestMode = () => {\n    console.log('🔵 Guest mode button clicked!');\n\n    // Prevent guest mode if authentication is in progress or already successful\n    if (loading || ssoLoading || authSuccess || user) {\n      console.log('⚠️ Preventing guest mode - auth in progress or user already authenticated');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    continueAsGuest();\n    console.log('✅ Guest mode activated');\n  };\n\n  const handleGoogleSignIn = async () => {\n    console.log('🔵 Google Sign-In button clicked!');\n    setSsoLoading(true);\n    try {\n      await signInWithGoogle();\n      console.log('✅ Google Sign-In successful!');\n      setAuthSuccess(true);\n      // Keep loading state for a moment to prevent interactions, then clear\n      setTimeout(() => {\n        setSsoLoading(false);\n      }, 500);\n    } catch (error: any) {\n      console.error('❌ Google Sign-In error:', error);\n      if (error.code === '12501') {\n        // User cancelled\n        console.log('User cancelled Google Sign-In');\n      } else {\n        Alert.alert('Error', 'Failed to sign in with Google. Please try again.');\n      }\n      setSsoLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleAppleSignIn = async () => {\n    console.log('🔵 Apple Sign-In button clicked!');\n    setSsoLoading(true);\n    try {\n      await signInWithApple();\n      console.log('✅ Apple Sign-In successful!');\n      setAuthSuccess(true);\n      // Keep loading state for a moment to prevent interactions, then clear\n      setTimeout(() => {\n        setSsoLoading(false);\n      }, 500);\n    } catch (error: any) {\n      console.error('❌ Apple Sign-In error:', error);\n      if (error.code !== '1001') {\n        // Don't show error if user cancelled (code 1001)\n        Alert.alert('Error', 'Failed to sign in with Apple. Please try again.');\n      }\n      setSsoLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  return (\n    <KeyboardAvoidingView\n      behavior={Platform.OS === 'ios' ? 'padding' : 'height'}\n      style={styles.container}\n    >\n      <View style={styles.content}>\n        <Text style={styles.title}>TEFPrep Pro</Text>\n        <Text style={styles.subtitle}>Master Your French Certification</Text>\n\n        <View style={styles.form}>\n          {!isLogin && (\n            <>\n              <TextInput\n                style={styles.input}\n                placeholder=\"First Name\"\n                value={firstName}\n                onChangeText={setFirstName}\n                autoCapitalize=\"words\"\n                placeholderTextColor={Colors.textSecondary}\n              />\n\n              <TextInput\n                style={styles.input}\n                placeholder=\"Last Name\"\n                value={lastName}\n                onChangeText={setLastName}\n                autoCapitalize=\"words\"\n                placeholderTextColor={Colors.textSecondary}\n              />\n            </>\n          )}\n\n          <TextInput\n            style={styles.input}\n            placeholder=\"Email\"\n            value={email}\n            onChangeText={setEmail}\n            keyboardType=\"email-address\"\n            autoCapitalize=\"none\"\n            placeholderTextColor={Colors.textSecondary}\n          />\n\n          <TextInput\n            style={styles.input}\n            placeholder=\"Password\"\n            value={password}\n            onChangeText={setPassword}\n            secureTextEntry\n            placeholderTextColor={Colors.textSecondary}\n          />\n\n          {isLogin && (\n            <TouchableOpacity\n              onPress={() => navigation.navigate('ForgotPassword')}\n              style={styles.forgotPasswordLink}\n            >\n              <Text style={styles.forgotPasswordText}>Forgot Password?</Text>\n            </TouchableOpacity>\n          )}\n\n          <TouchableOpacity\n            style={[styles.button, loading && styles.buttonDisabled]}\n            onPress={handleSubmit}\n            disabled={loading}\n          >\n            <Text style={styles.buttonText}>\n              {loading ? 'Please wait...' : isLogin ? 'Sign In' : 'Sign Up'}\n            </Text>\n          </TouchableOpacity>\n\n          <TouchableOpacity onPress={() => setIsLogin(!isLogin)}>\n            <Text style={styles.switchText}>\n              {isLogin ? \"Don't have an account? Sign Up\" : 'Already have an account? Sign In'}\n            </Text>\n          </TouchableOpacity>\n\n          {isLogin && (\n            <>\n              <View style={styles.divider}>\n                <View style={styles.dividerLine} />\n                <Text style={styles.dividerText}>OR</Text>\n                <View style={styles.dividerLine} />\n              </View>\n\n              <TouchableOpacity\n                style={[styles.ssoButton, styles.googleButton, ssoLoading && styles.buttonDisabled]}\n                onPress={handleGoogleSignIn}\n                disabled={ssoLoading || loading}\n              >\n                <Text style={styles.ssoButtonText}>\n                  {ssoLoading ? 'Please wait...' : '🔵 Continue with Google'}\n                </Text>\n              </TouchableOpacity>\n\n              {Platform.OS === 'ios' && (\n                <TouchableOpacity\n                  style={[styles.ssoButton, styles.appleButton, ssoLoading && styles.buttonDisabled]}\n                  onPress={handleAppleSignIn}\n                  disabled={ssoLoading || loading}\n                >\n                  <Text style={[styles.ssoButtonText, styles.appleButtonText]}>\n                    {ssoLoading ? 'Please wait...' : ' Continue with Apple'}\n                  </Text>\n                </TouchableOpacity>\n              )}\n            </>\n          )}\n\n          <TouchableOpacity\n            onPress={handleGuestMode}\n            disabled={loading || ssoLoading || authSuccess}\n          >\n            <Text\n              style={[\n                styles.guestText,\n                (loading || ssoLoading || authSuccess) && styles.guestTextDisabled,\n              ]}\n            >\n              Continue as Guest\n            </Text>\n          </TouchableOpacity>\n        </View>\n      </View>\n    </KeyboardAvoidingView>\n  );\n}\n\nconst styles = StyleSheet.create({\n  container: {\n    flex: 1,\n    backgroundColor: Colors.background,\n  },\n  content: {\n    flex: 1,\n    justifyContent: 'center',\n    padding: 20,\n  },\n  title: {\n    fontSize: 36,\n    fontWeight: 'bold',\n    color: Colors.primary,\n    textAlign: 'center',\n    marginBottom: 8,\n  },\n  subtitle: {\n    fontSize: 16,\n    color: Colors.textSecondary,\n    textAlign: 'center',\n    marginBottom: 40,\n  },\n  form: {\n    width: '100%',\n  },\n  input: {\n    backgroundColor: Colors.surface,\n    borderWidth: 1,\n    borderColor: Colors.border,\n    borderRadius: 12,\n    padding: 16,\n    fontSize: 16,\n    marginBottom: 16,\n    color: Colors.textPrimary,\n  },\n  button: {\n    backgroundColor: Colors.primary,\n    padding: 16,\n    borderRadius: 12,\n    alignItems: 'center',\n    marginTop: 8,\n  },\n  buttonDisabled: {\n    opacity: 0.6,\n  },\n  buttonText: {\n    color: Colors.textInverse,\n    fontSize: 18,\n    fontWeight: 'bold',\n  },\n  switchText: {\n    color: Colors.primary,\n    textAlign: 'center',\n    marginTop: 20,\n    fontSize: 14,\n  },\n  guestText: {\n    color: Colors.textSecondary,\n    textAlign: 'center',\n    marginTop: 16,\n    fontSize: 14,\n  },\n  guestTextDisabled: {\n    opacity: 0.3,\n  },\n  forgotPasswordLink: {\n    alignSelf: 'flex-end',\n    marginBottom: 8,\n  },\n  forgotPasswordText: {\n    color: Colors.primary,\n    fontSize: 14,\n    fontWeight: '500',\n  },\n  divider: {\n    flexDirection: 'row',\n    alignItems: 'center',\n    marginVertical: 24,\n  },\n  dividerLine: {\n    flex: 1,\n    height: 1,\n    backgroundColor: Colors.border,\n  },\n  dividerText: {\n    color: Colors.textSecondary,\n    paddingHorizontal: 16,\n    fontSize: 14,\n    fontWeight: '500',\n  },\n  ssoButton: {\n    padding: 16,\n    borderRadius: 12,\n    alignItems: 'center',\n    marginBottom: 12,\n    borderWidth: 1,\n  },\n  googleButton: {\n    backgroundColor: Colors.surface,\n    borderColor: Colors.border,\n  },\n  appleButton: {\n    backgroundColor: '#000',\n    borderColor: '#000',\n  },\n  ssoButtonText: {\n    fontSize: 16,\n    fontWeight: '600',\n    color: Colors.textPrimary,\n  },\n  appleButtonText: {\n    color: '#fff',\n useFocusEffect } from '@react-navigation/native';\nimport { Colors } from '../utils/colors';\nimport { useSubscription } from '../context/SubscriptionContext';\nimport { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext';\nimport { revenueCatService } from '../services/revenueCatService';\nimport { PurchasesPackage } from 'react-native-purchases';\n\ntype Props = {\n  navigation: NativeStackNavigationProp<any>;\n};\n\nexport default function SubscriptionScreen({ navigation }: Props) {\n  const { subscription, hasActiveSubscription, refreshSubscription, offerings } = useSubscription();\n  const { user } = useAuth();\n  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);\n  const [packages, setPackages] = useState<PurchasesPackage[]>([]);\n  const [loadingTimeout, setLoadingTimeout] = useState(false);\n\n  // Refresh subscription data and load packages when screen comes into focus\n  useFocusEffect(\n    React.useCallback(() => {\n      refreshSubscription();\n      loadPackages();\n    }, [offerings])\n  );\n\n  // Set timeout for loading offerings\n  useEffect(() => {\n    const timer = setTimeout(() => {\n      if (packages.length === 0) {\n        console.log('⏰ Timeout waiting for offerings');\n        setLoadingTimeout(true);\n      }\n    }, 10000); // 10 seconds\n\n    return () => clearTimeout(timer);\n  }, [packages]);\n\n  const loadPackages = () => {\n    console.log('🔍 loadPackages called');\n    console.log('🔍 offerings:', offerings);\n    console.log('🔍 offerings?.current:', offerings?.current);\n\n    if (!offerings) {\n      console.log('❌ No offerings object available');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    if (!offerings?.current) {\n      console.log('❌ No current offering available');\n      console.log('🔍 All offerings keys:', Object.keys(offerings.all));\n\n      // Try to use any available offering\n      const allOfferingsKeys = Object.keys(offerings.all);\n      if (allOfferingsKeys.length > 0) {\n        const firstOfferingKey = allOfferingsKeys[0];\n        const firstOffering = offerings.all[firstOfferingKey];\n        console.log(`🔄 Using first available offering: \"${firstOfferingKey}\"`);\n        console.log('🔍 First offering packages:', firstOffering.availablePackages.length);\n\n        if (firstOffering.availablePackages.length > 0) {\n          setPackages(firstOffering.availablePackages);\n          console.log('✅ Loaded', firstOffering.availablePackages.length, 'packages from first offering');\n          return;\n        }\n      }\n\n      console.log('❌ No offerings have any packages');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const availablePackages = offerings.current.availablePackages;\n    console.log('🔍 Current offering identifier:', offerings.current.identifier);\n    console.log('🔍 Available packages count:', availablePackages.length);\n\n    if (availablePackages.length === 0) {\n      console.log('❌ Current offering has 0 packages');\n      console.log('🔍 Checking all offerings for packages...');\n\n      Object.keys(offerings.all).forEach(key => {\n        const offering = offerings.all[key];\n        console.log(`   - Offering \"${key}\": ${offering.availablePackages.length} packages`);\n      });\n    }\n\n    setPackages(availablePackages);\n    console.log('✅ Loaded', availablePackages.length, 'packages from RevenueCat');\n    availablePackages.forEach((pkg, index) => {\n      console.log(`📦 Package ${index + 1}:`, pkg.identifier, pkg.product.identifier, pkg.product.priceString);\n    });\n  };\n\n  const getPackageDetails = (pkg: PurchasesPackage) => {\n    const isMonthly = pkg.identifier === 'monthly' || pkg.product.identifier.includes('monthly');\n\n    return {\n      id: pkg.identifier,\n      name: isMonthly ? 'Monthly Plan' : 'Yearly Plan',\n      price: pkg.product.priceString,\n      period: isMonthly ? '/month' : '/year',\n      savings: isMonthly ? null : 'Save $20/year',\n      features: isMonthly\n        ? [\n            'Access to all premium papers',\n            'Unlimited test attempts',\n            'Detailed performance analytics',\n            'New content added regularly',\n            'Cancel anytime',\n          ]\n        : [\n            'Everything in Monthly Plan',\n            'Best value - 2 months free',\n            'Priority support',\n            'Early access to new features',\n            'Exclusive study materials',\n          ],\n      popular: !isMonthly,\n      package: pkg,\n    };\n  };\n\n  const handlePurchase = async (pkg: PurchasesPackage) => {\n    if (!user) {\n      Alert.alert('Error', 'Please login to subscribe');\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const details = getPackageDetails(pkg);\n\n    Alert.alert(\n      'Confirm Subscription',\n      `Subscribe to ${details.name} for ${details.price}${details.period}?\\n\\n` +\n        (hasActiveSubscription\n          ? 'This will switch your current plan.'\n          : 'You will get instant access to all premium papers.'),\n      [\n        { text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel' },\n        {\n          text: 'Subscribe',\n          onPress: async () => {\n            setLoading(true);\n            try {\n              const result = await revenueCatService.purchasePackage(pkg);\n\n              if (result.success) {\n                await refreshSubscription();\n\n                Alert.alert(\n                  'Welcome to Premium! 🎉',\n                  `You are now subscribed to the ${details.name}.\\n\\nAll premium papers are now unlocked!`,\n                  [\n                    {\n                      text: 'Start Learning',\n                      onPress: () => {\n                        if (navigation.canGoBack()) {\n                          navigation.goBack();\n                        }\n                      },\n                    },\n                  ]\n                );\n              }\n            } catch (error: any) {\n              // Handle specific errors\n              if (error.message === 'CANCELLED') {\n                // User cancelled, do nothing\n                return;\n              }\n\n              if (error.message === 'PAYMENT_PENDING') {\n                Alert.alert(\n                  'Payment Pending',\n                  'Your payment is being processed. You will get access once the payment is confirmed.'\n                );\n                return;\n              }\n\n              // Generic error\n              Alert.alert(\n                'Purchase Failed',\n                error.message || 'Failed to complete purchase. Please try again.'\n              );\n            } finally {\n              setLoading(false);\n            }\n          },\n        },\n      ]\n    );\n  };\n\n  const handleManageSubscription = () => {\n    if (!user) return;\n\n    const platformName = Platform.OS === 'ios' ? 'App Store' : 'Google Play';\n\n    Alert.alert(\n      'Manage Subscription',\n      `To manage or cancel your subscription, please visit your ${platformName} account settings.\\n\\nWould you like to open ${platformName} now?`,\n      [\n        { text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel' },\n        {\n          text: `Open ${platformName}`,\n          onPress: () => {\n            if (Platform.OS === 'ios') {\n              Linking.openURL('https://apps.apple.com/account/subscriptions');\n            } else {\n              Linking.openURL('https://play.google.com/store/account/subscriptions');\n            }\n          },\n        },\n      ]\n    );\n  };\n\n  const handleRestorePurchases = async () => {\n    setLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const customerInfo = await revenueCatService.restorePurchases();\n      await refreshSubscription();\n\n      const hasActiveEntitlement = customerInfo.entitlements.active['premium_access'] !== undefined;\n\n      if (hasActiveEntitlement) {\n        Alert.alert(\n          'Success! 🎉',\n          'Your purchases have been restored successfully!\\n\\nYou now have access to all premium content.'\n        );\n      } else {\n        Alert.alert(\n          'No Purchases Found',\n          'No active subscriptions were found to restore.\\n\\nIf you believe this is an error, please contact support.'\n        );\n      }\n    } catch (error: any) {\n      Alert.alert(\n        'Restore Failed',\n        'Failed to restore purchases. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.'\n      );\n    } finally {\n      setLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  return (\n    <>\n      <ScrollView style={styles.container}>\n        <View style={styles.header}>\n          <Text style={styles.title}>Choose Your Plan</Text>\n          <Text style={styles.subtitle}>\n            Unlock all premium papers and master your French certification\n          </Text>\n        </View>\n\n        {hasActiveSubscription && subscription && (\n          <View style={styles.currentPlanCard}>\n            <Text style={styles.currentPlanBadge}>✓ Active</Text>\n            <Text style={styles.currentPlanTitle}>Current Plan</Text>\n            <Text style={styles.currentPlanName}>\n              {subscription.plan === 'monthly' ? 'Monthly' : subscription.plan === 'yearly' ? 'Yearly' : 'Premium'} Subscription\n            </Text>\n            {subscription.expirationDate && (\n              <Text style={styles.currentPlanExpiry}>\n                {subscription.willRenew ? 'Renews' : 'Expires'} on{' '}\n                {new Date(subscription.expirationDate).toLocaleDateString()}\n              </Text>\n            )}\n            <TouchableOpacity\n              style={styles.manageButton}\n              onPress={handleManageSubscription}\n            >\n              <Text style={styles.manageButtonText}>Manage Subscription</Text>\n            </TouchableOpacity>\n          </View>\n        )}\n\n        <View style={styles.plansContainer}>\n          {packages.length > 0 ? (\n            packages.map((pkg) => {\n              const plan = getPackageDetails(pkg);\n              return (\n                <View\n                  key={plan.id}\n                  style={[styles.planCard, plan.popular && styles.popularPlan]}\n                >\n                  {plan.popular && (\n                    <View style={styles.popularBadge}>\n                      <Text style={styles.popularBadgeText}>⭐ Most Popular</Text>\n                    </View>\n                  )}\n\n                  <Text style={styles.planName}>{plan.name}</Text>\n\n                  <View style={styles.priceContainer}>\n                    <Text style={styles.price}>{plan.price}</Text>\n                    <Text style={styles.period}>{plan.period}</Text>\n                  </View>\n\n                  {plan.savings && (\n                    <View style={styles.savingsBadge}>\n                      <Text style={styles.savingsText}>{plan.savings}</Text>\n                    </View>\n                  )}\n\n                  <View style={styles.featuresContainer}>\n                    {plan.features.map((feature, index) => (\n                      <View key={index} style={styles.featureRow}>\n                        <Text style={styles.checkmark}>✓</Text>\n                        <Text style={styles.featureText}>{feature}</Text>\n                      </View>\n                    ))}\n                  </View>\n\n                  <TouchableOpacity\n                    style={[\n                      styles.subscribeButton,\n                      plan.popular && styles.popularSubscribeButton,\n                    ]}\n                    onPress={() => handlePurchase(plan.package)}\n                    disabled={loading}\n                  >\n                    <Text\n                      style={[\n                        styles.subscribeButtonText,\n                        plan.popular && styles.popularSubscribeButtonText,\n                      ]}\n                    >\n                      {hasActiveSubscription ? 'Switch Plan' : 'Subscribe Now'}\n                    </Text>\n                  </TouchableOpacity>\n                </View>\n              );\n            })\n          ) : loadingTimeout || !offerings ? (\n            <View style={styles.loadingPackages}>\n              <Text style={styles.errorIcon}>⚠️</Text>\n              <Text style={styles.errorTitle}>Unable to Load Plans</Text>\n              <Text style={styles.errorText}>\n                {!offerings\n                  ? Please check your internet connection and try again.'}\n              </Text>\n              <TouchableOpacity\n                style={styles.retryButton}\n                onPress={() => {\n        </Text>\n            </View>\n          </View>\n        </View>\n\n        {/* Restore Purchases Button (Required for iOS) */}\n        <TouchableOpacity\n
